original: Letter to a Centurion.
translation: 给一名百夫长的信

original:
Centurion Amulius

As you know, the occupation of this land has gone well, but it is not without compromise, some of the dissolute have less than obedient attitudes, we know that you have a pre-dispostion to making people, see your world view so to speak..., and you have been assigned to carry this out.

This is your task Centurion.
translation:
百夫长阿穆利乌斯

如你所知，对这片土地的占领进展顺利，但也并非没有折中，有些放荡者并不顺从。我们知道你有一种让人……看见你的世界观的支配力，现指派你处理。

这就是你的任务，百夫长。

original:
Occupation Title: Construction Worker

Description: You are to, under the supervision of a construction foreman and appointed Securitron monitor, construct the framework and subsquent building infrastructure of the Free Economic Zone of New Vegas, tools will be provided and a meeting with your local Securitron work assigner will be needed to assess your fitness for this work.

Pay: 6 caps per hour.

Hours/days: 9 hours starting at 8AM until 5PM, 5 days per week excluding weekends.
translation:
岗位：建筑工人

描述：在一名工头和电子保安的监督下，你将参与建造新维加斯自由贸易区的框架和后续建筑。我们将提供工具，请前往本地的电子保安招聘处面试。

薪资：时薪6瓶盖。

工时：每天9小时，从早8点到晚5点，一周除周末外工作5天。

original:
Occupation Title: Bar Attendant

Description: Starting after the construction of the new location "Bliss", you will be responsible for serving patrons at the bar and having a friendly demeanor and proper work ethic, no assessment will be necessary and you should apply directly to the manager of this location.

Pay: 2 caps per hour.

Hours: 12 hours starting at 9AM til 9PM, 5 days per week excluding weekends.
translation:
岗位：酒吧服务员

描述：在新店“极乐”建设完成后，你将负责在酒吧招待老主顾，需要举止得体有风度。并且有高度的职业道德。无需分配，直接向该店经理报道。

薪资：时薪2瓶盖。

工时：每天12小时，从早9点到晚9点，一周除周末外工作5天。

original:
Occupation Title: Activity Coordinator

Description: You are to, operating under the guidance of a Securitron, organise activities and manage public relations in the entire area of the Free Economic Zone of New Vegas, to take this occupation you will need to be assessed by a Securitron and meet specific criteria.

Pay: 8 caps per hour.

Hours: 6 hours starting at 12PM til 6PM, all week.
translation:
岗位：活动统筹人

描述：在一名电子保安的指导下，你将在整个新维加斯自由贸易区内组织活动、处理公关。要获得该岗位，你需要由一名电子保安分配并满足特定条件。

薪资：时薪8瓶盖。

工时：每天6小时，从12点到晚6点，全周工作。

original:
Occupation Title: Supply Overseer

Description: In this occupation, you will be expected to rendezvous with local Westside residents and a Securitron supervisor in order to gauge the correct supply distributions in Westside whether this is food, building supplies, or otherwise. An assessment by Securitron will be necessary to take this occupation.

Pay: 7 caps per hour.

Hours/days: : 8 hours starting at 9AM until 5PM, 5 days per week excluding weekends.
translation:
岗位：供给监督

描述：在该岗位上，你要组织西区当地居民的集会，在一名电子保安的监督下正确分配供给，无论是食物、建材还是别的。你需要接受电子保安的分配。

薪资：时薪7瓶盖。

工时：每天8小时，从早9点到晚5点，一周除周末外工作5天。

original:
Occupation Title: Street Janitor

Description: In this role, you will be expected to clean up the streets of Westside such as removing litter, stains and other impediments. No assessment is neccesary for this occupation.

Pay: 2 caps per hour.

Hours/days: 11 hours starting at 8AM until 7PM, 5 days per week excluding weekends.
translation:
岗位：街道清洁工

描述：在西区的街道上清理垃圾、污垢及其它障碍物。无需等待分配。

薪资：时薪2瓶盖。

工时：每天11小时，从早8点到晚7点，一周除周末外工作5天。

original:
Occupation Title: Receptionist

Description: For this occupation, you will serve as a receptionist for a new and upcoming business, you are expected to manage typical duties such as filing paperwork, handling new clients, and manage inter-business relations. No Securitron evaluation is neccesary.

Pay: 4 caps per hour.

Hours/days: 8 hours starting at 9AM until 5PM, 5 days per week excluding weekends.
translation:
岗位：接待员

描述：你将作为未来新商业的接待员，处理文书工作、接待客户、处理商业关系。无需接受电子保安评估。

薪资：时薪4瓶盖。

工时：每天8小时，从早9点到晚5点，一周除周末外工作5天。

original: Gambling Notice
translation: 赌博告示

original: Under the law of Caesar, all gambling functions of this casino have been rendered out of operation permanently. All forms of currency or chips are invalid, and any attempts to circumvent this will be met with execution.
translation: 以凯撒的律法，本赌场的一切赌博行为都永久停止。一切形式的货币或筹码都已作废，尝试钻空子将被处决。

original: NCR Recruitment Brochure
translation: NCR征兵宣传册

original:
Unhappy with life? Have no purpose apart from scavenging and living in crumbling buildings? Struggling to make ends meet in the unbearable Mojave sun?

Then consider joining the NCR military!

Join a roster of thousands of soldiers with the ultimate aim of bringing civilization to the whole of America, experience comradery, travel to new places, and operate under the guidance of our experienced officers and rangers to create a new you!

Why delay? Join the NCR military today!
translation:
生活不如意了？除了拾荒和住在摇摇欲坠的建筑中一无所成？在莫哈维难忍的太阳下为生计奔波？

考虑加入NCR军队吧！

与数千名士兵为伍，以让全美国恢复文明为最终目标。体验战友情，探索新地区，并在我们最富有经验的官员和游骑兵的指导下创造新的自我！

还等什么？今天加入NCR军队！

original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: Thanks for the assist. Wish others around here had your drive.
translation: 多谢相助。真希望这里的其他人也能像你一样热心。

original: Mind yourself on the plank going down.
translation: 留心飞来横祸。

original: What else did you want to discuss?
translation: 你还想讨论什么？

original: True to {KAI-zar}Caesar.
translation: 凯撒{KAI-zar}万岁。

original: {Dying}Heh... I knew you'd be the death of me.
translation: {Dying}呵……我就知道你会把我送上绝路。

original: *struggling for breath*
translation: *挣扎着呼吸*

original: *coughing*
translation: *咳嗽*

original: *pain*
translation: *痛苦！*

original: I'm really busy now, sorry.
translation: 我现在真的很忙，抱歉。

original: Don't bother me. I'm on patrol.
translation: 别烦我，我在执勤。

original: Howdy, pardner!
translation: 你好，伙计！

original: We have cities of our own, but nothing compared to Vegas. Finally, my Legion will have its Rome.
translation: 我们有自己的城市，但都比不上维加斯。很快，我的帝国就将拥有属于它的罗马。

original: Keep fighting!
translation: 继续战斗！

original: Yes? Do you have something to report?
translation: 好的，你有什么需要报告的吗？ ?

original: Was there more for us to discuss?
translation: 我们还有什么需要讨论的吗？

original: Oh, hi again! Can I help you with something else?
translation: 噢，嗨！你还有什么别的需要吗？

original: Oh, hi again! Can I help you with something else?
translation: 噢，嗨！你还有什么别的需要吗？

original: I've run out of witty ways to tell you to leave, so why don't you just go?
translation: 我已经努力在用最委婉的方式劝你离开了，可你为什么还不走呢？

original: I hear the NCR and the Kings have been getting along. That's good news for Freeside.
translation: 听说NCR和猫王帮握手言和了。这对自由城来说是个好消息。

original: Don't look at me!
translation: 别看我！

original: Someone's watching me, I can feel it.
translation: 有人在看我，我能感觉到。

original: So many staring eyes...
translation: 这么多眼睛盯着我……

original: There's too much light. Why is there always too much light?
translation: 太亮了。为什么那里总是那么亮？

original: The voices in my head are getting louder...
translation: 我脑海里的声音越来越响了……

original: The pain won't go away.
translation: 痛苦不会退去。

original: {Imminent Cure}The cure is finally coming to make the voices stop.
translation: {Imminent Cure}解药终于让那些声音停下来了。

original: {Eventual Cure}{angry, impatient}We were promised a cure long before this, and now we must wait some more?
translation: {Eventual Cure}{angry, impatient}你早就答应要帮我们搞来解药，现在你告诉我们还得再等等？

original: Watch out for Fiends.
translation: 小心恶魔帮。

original: Welcome to Jacobstown, human. You're free to walk around, just don't stare at the Nightkin. They don't like people looking at them.
translation: 欢迎来到雅各布斯镇，人类。你可以随意走动，别盯着夜行族看就是了。他们不喜欢被人看着。

original: {A little quieter, more confidentially}And if you're NCR, keep it to yourself. They're not popular around here.
translation: {A little quieter, more confidentially}另外，如果你是NCR的人，那最好别说出来。他们在这不受欢迎。

original: If it isn't the guy that defeated the Legion at Nelson. I can't thank you enough, morale around here has never been higher.
translation: 这不是在纳尔逊打败了军团的那位伙计嘛。这里的士气从没这么高涨过，我怎么谢你都不为过啊。

original: Set vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1 to Player.GetItemCount LegionEar\nSet vFreeformForlornHope03.CashMoney to vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1 * 2\nSet vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarPreTotal to vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarTotal + vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1
If it isn't the gal that defeated the Legion at Nelson. I can't thank you enough, morale around here has never been higher.
translation: 这不是在纳尔逊打败了军团那位姑娘嘛。这里的士气从没这么高涨过，我怎么谢你都不为过啊。

original: Set vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1 to Player.GetItemCount LegionEar\nSet vFreeformForlornHope03.CashMoney to vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1 * 2\nSet vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarPreTotal to vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarTotal + vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1
If it's bad news, you can take it up with the Colonel. If it's good news, it better involve some dead Fiends.
translation: 如果是坏消息，你就去找上校说。如果是好消息，那最好是死了几个恶魔帮。

original: Fiends... cracked-out junkies. All those chems make them a real bitch to take down.
translation: 恶魔帮……脑子进水的垃圾。恰恰就是他们嗑的这些药，让他们变得特别难对付。.

original: We should be taking the fight to the Legion, not waiting for them to pick us apart.
translation: 我们应该主动迎击军团，而不是等着他们来把我们各个击破。

original: Hi there. I'm Old Lady Gibson, or so they tell me. I've got odds and ends for sale, and I'm pretty good at fixing things, too.
translation: 嗨。我是老太太吉布森，至少他们是这样称呼我的。我有些稀罕玩意可以卖，另外我对修修补补也很在行。

original: You might have noticed the very large building just north of here. That's HELIOS One. The NCR runs the place, so it's off-limits to prospectors.
translation: 你可能已经注意到了这里北方那座很大的建筑。那就是太阳神一号。NCR驻扎在那里，所以拾荒者都禁止入内。

original:
setStage vDialogueEDE 10
if vNPCFollowers.bEDEHired == 1
 set vDialogueEDE.bGibsonOnce to 1
endif
ShowMap VHeliosONEMapMarkerREF
{Strong emotion veiled by stoic expression}The Thorn does not welcome you, stranger. Leave now or suffer the consequences.
translation: {Strong emotion veiled by stoic expression}荆棘街不欢迎你，陌生人。马上离开，否则后果自负。

original: {About to attack player}I admire your bravery, but coming down here after what you've done is just foolish. So be it, Legion dog!
translation: {About to attack player}我敬佩你的勇气，但你干了坏事之后还敢来这里，简直是愚蠢。来吧，军团狗！

original: SetEnemy VCaesarsLegionFaction VThornDwellers 0 0\nStartCombat Player
I'd remember if I had seen you here before, I'm sure of it... {pauses as if thinking "anyway, whatever"}What do you want?
translation: 如果我见过你，我一定会记得的……算了。你要什么？

original:
Set VMS38.LucyFirstTalk to 1
Set VMS38.RandomShow to GetRandomPercent
Set VMS38.CreaturesRedNumber to 0
Set VMS38.CreaturesBlueNumber to 0
Set VMS38.CreaturesRedDefeated to 0
Set VMS38.CreaturesBlueDefeated to 0
Set VMS38.CreaturesRedLose to 0
Set VMS38.CreaturesBlueLose to 0
Someone blew up the monorail the NCR uses to travel to the Strip and back. We should use this time to strike!
translation: 有人把NCR用于往返长街的单轨铁路炸了。我们应该抓住这个时机进攻！

original: Seems the destruction of the monorail didn't slow the NCR down much. How many troops do they have?
translation: 看来炸毁铁路也没有打乱NCR的部署。他们到底有多少兵力啊？

original: Seems the NCR is making friends. We've had reports of them making overtures to some gang in Freeside.
translation: 看来NCR正在结交朋友。我们得到报告说他们正在主动联系自由城的一些帮派。

original: We just had word that the town of Primm is now part of the NCR. At this rate, they'll be running the whole region soon.
translation: 我们刚刚才听说普瑞姆现在已经归顺NCR了。这样下去，他们很快就会控制这一整片地区。

original: You're not doing yourself a favor by having him tag along. NCR aren't welcome here.
translation: 你让他跟着你可不是什么好事。NCR在这里不受欢迎。

original: Well, it looks like we won't have to worry about NCR or the Legion messing with us now. I just hope the Securitrons can keep the peace.
translation: 好吧，现在NCR和军团都不会来打扰我们了，但愿这些电子保安能一直维持和平。

original: They say you swarmed the dam with a whole army of Securitrons! That must have been quite a sight!
translation: 他们说你带领电子保安大军横扫了水坝，那场面一定非常壮观！

original: Can't say I like all the tin cans shuffling around, but this new Securitron Army shouldn't have much trouble keeping things safer around here.
translation: 我可不太喜欢这些铁皮罐子，但是这支新的电子保安大军确实能够维护和平。

original: {Before Prison Attack}Gotta wonder why the NCR hasn't come for us.
translation: {Before Prison Attack}NCR的人怎么还不来。

original: Fuck, where are we gonna get our shit from now that the Khans are all buddy buddy with the NCR?
translation: 操，大汗帮都和NCR称兄道弟了，我们以后从哪儿搞药啊。 ?

original: NCR is going to be rip shit about losing their little train.
translation: 没了小火车，NCR会跟丢了魂一样。

original: A guy I know said there's some kind of cannibal army camped out to the east.
translation: 我认识的一个人说有一支食人者部队在东边出现。

original: The NCR should just take this place over. Their army's big enough.
translation: NCR真该直接占领这片地区。他们的部队足够大了。

original: Seems the Misfits scored pretty well on their readiness evaluations. That strikes me as... suspicious.
translation: 后进生的演练成绩相当不错啊。这让我十分……怀疑。

original: I'm not sure what's going on with the Misfits - their accuracy is in the toilet, but they're spoiling for a fight like I ain't never seen.
translation: 我不明白后进生是怎么回事——虽然他们的准头依然在天上飘，但我从没见过他们的斗志如此昂扬。

original: I hear Caesar's dead. Maybe that means the war will be over soon.
translation: 我听说凯撒死了。也许战争很快就会结束了。

original: {Apprehensive}Kimball's dead, I wonder how long until the Legion's at our walls.
translation: {Apprehensive}金博尔死了，不知道军团兵临城下还需要多久。

original: {Hopeful}Did you hear about the Legion Defeat at Nelson? We're winning back our territories.
translation: {Hopeful}你听说军团在纳尔逊被打败的事情了吗？我们正在收复失地。

original: {Cautious}I'll believe that the Fiends are gone when they stop their raiding and pillaging.
translation: {Cautious}等到那些恶魔帮不再烧杀抢掠的时候，我才能相信他们死光了。

original: {Hindsight}Should've bet we'd kill the Fiend's leader.
translation: {Hindsight}早知道就赌我们会杀掉恶魔帮头目了。

original: {Fearful}War doesn't forgive anybody, but what did we do to deserve this?
translation: {Fearful}战争不会放过任何人，但我们凭什么要遭这个罪啊？

original: {Indignated}I hear some asshole freed our enemy from McCarran.
translation: {Indignated}我听说有傻逼从麦卡伦营地放走了我们的敌人。

original: {Celebratory}With Mr. House dead and gone, Vegas can finally join the NCR!
translation: {Celebratory}豪斯先生死了，维加斯也终于可以加入NCR了！

original: {Hopeful}I hope the Fiends stop their raids now that their boss is gone.
translation: {Hopeful}我希望这些恶魔帮别再出来打劫了，他们的老大都挂了。.

original: You're the one who busted those assholes at Gomorrah, huh? Good work!
translation: 你就是那个把蛾摩拉掀了个底朝天的人吧？干得好！

original: Fucking Crocker couldn't find his ass if it wasn't on his backside...
translation: 他妈的克罗克，老子看他是连自己的屁股都找不着……

original: Fiends are bad for business. NCR should do their fucking job.
translation: 恶魔帮只会把生意搅黄。NCR倒是干点他妈的正事啊。

original: There's some serious shit going on between NCR and the Legion. They better not fuck with our power.
translation: NCR与军团好像杠上了。别他妈牵涉到我们这里就好。

original: Kings sold out to the NCR huh? Might be worth a sit down with them.
translation: 猫王帮把自己卖给NCR了？他们从中捞了不少好处吧。

original: I hear the Legion is moving some new tough muscle into the area. NCR better keep their heads down.
translation: 我听说军团又派了一支精锐部队进驻这个区域。NCR最好小心点。

original: The NCR seems none too happy about losing their little train.
translation: 小火车报废了，NCR不开心了。

original: Are you the one that killed Motor-Runner? Thank God. That guy was a living nightmare.
translation: 你就是杀死轰鸣恶煞的那个人？谢天谢地。那个家伙就是个噩梦。

original: Bad time to lose Chief Hanlon. He'd have had Caesar running scared.
translation: 这时候失去汉隆军士长真是太糟了。他能把凯撒吓得屁滚尿流。

original: We lost Forlorn Hope. The eastern front is collapsing. They'll be here next.
translation: 我们失去了飘零希望营地。东部战线也在崩溃。他们很快就会打到这里来的。

original: Thank God we took back Nelson. Now they'll have a harder time hitting us here.
translation: 感谢上帝，我们夺回了纳尔逊。现在他们想进攻这里就更难了。

original: With Caesar dead, maybe they'll stop attacking us.
translation: 凯撒死了，他们也许不会再攻击我们了。

original: {respectful}I have heard how you cleansed Forlorn Hope of the Profligates.
translation: {respectful}我听说你净化了飘零希望营地的荒淫之人。

original: Nelson, Forlorn Hope... soon {KAI-zar's}Caesar's banners shall rise on Hoover Dam.
translation: 纳尔逊，飘零希望营地……用不了多久，凯撒的旗帜就会在胡佛水坝上空飘扬。

original: Our march to the Dam is assured.
translation: 我们肯定会向水坝进军。

original: With Forlorn Hope's fall, our blades are at the NCR's throat.
translation: 既然攻陷了飘零希望营地，我们的利刃就架在NCR的脖子上了。

original: The NCR must have paid off the Kings big to get them to sign up. Maybe there was an NCR mole who tricked them into it!
translation: 猫王帮肯定是从NCR手里得了不少好处才会同意和解的。要么就是NCR的间谍骗了他们！

original: Good news for Freeside. The Kings have decided to work with NCR for a change.
translation: 自由城的好消息。猫王帮决定和NCR通力合作，共创未来。

original: I heard Motor-Runner got taken down. Maybe the Fiends will finally destroy themselves now that he's gone.
translation: 我听说轰鸣恶煞被干掉了。没了他，恶魔帮最终可能会自我毁灭吧。.

original: Kimball getting killed is going to make a mess of things around here. The troopers coming through here are mean enough already.
translation: 金博尔一死，这里的局势更混乱了。不断增加的部队已经证明了这点。

original: Killing Kimball is going to make a mess of things around here. The troopers coming through here are mean enough already.
translation: 金博尔一死，这里的局势更混乱了。不断增加的部队已经证明了这点。

original: So, I hear that assassination attempt on Kimball didn't quite turn out the way you planned. Now, the NCR are going to be even pissier than usual.
translation: 我听说刺杀金博尔的计划没成功。现在NCR比平常更神经紧张了。

original: With the monorail down, we're going to have a lot more NCR goons wandering through here. Yay...
translation: 列车没了，跑来乱晃的NCR军队要更多了。爽……

original: With no House to boss Vegas around, the NCR's gonna want that job.
translation: 既然豪斯没法再管理维加斯，NCR肯定想要代劳。

original: According to the rumor mill, House is faking his death to catch the NCR off-guard.
translation: 坊间传说，豪斯只是诈死麻痹NCR。

original: I hear you made a real mess of the Omerta's plans. Hopefully, the new management does a better job running Gomorrah.
translation: 我听说你彻底粉碎了黑手党们的阴谋。希望蛾摩拉的新管理者能比黑手党干得好。

original: It's getting nasty out here. S'times like these I thank god for artillery.
translation: 外面的情况越来越糟。有时候真要感谢上帝，幸好我们还有这些大炮。

original: War's brewing on the horizon, plain as day.
translation: 毫无疑问，战争一触即发。

original: {Satisfied}Mr. House won't trouble our plans for the Strip any longer, huh!?
translation: {Satisfied}豪斯先生不会再影响我们在长街的计划了，是吗！？

original: {Proud}NCR should take this chance, now that Mr. House's out of the way.
translation: {Proud}现在豪斯先生已经不再是问题了，NCR应该抓住这个机会。

original: {Relieved}Good riddance, Caesar! We can finally enjoy some R&R without worrying about a Legion attack at McCarran.
translation: {Relieved}凯撒死得好啊！我们终于可以真正休个好假，而不必担心军团进攻麦卡伦了。

original: {Celebratory}Without leadership, the Fiends are as good as dead!
translation: {Celebratory}没了首领，恶魔帮已经和死了没区别了！

original: {Celebratory}House was the only thing keeping Vegas from joining the NCR!
translation: {Celebratory}豪斯是阻止维加斯加入NCR的唯一障碍！

original: {Slight Relief}Our guys put the Monorail back to work!
translation: {Slight Relief}我们的人修好了列车！

original: {Assertive}That Fiend leader shouldn't have messed with our great army.
translation: {Assertive}那个恶魔帮的头目就不该招惹我们的大军。

original: {Proud}The Fiends are running for their lives. That'll show everyone what we do to our enemies.
translation: {Proud}恶魔帮的人已经做鸟兽散了。这下敌人该明白我们的实力了。

original: {Worried}If the Legion can reach as far as Bitter Springs, what's going to stop them from getting to us?
translation: {Worried}如果军团的魔爪能触及苦泉镇，还有什么能阻止他们把手伸向我们呢？

original: {Proud}Those Khans got the hint! We've shown everyone that these are our new territories.
translation: {Proud}大汗帮的人终于开窍了！这下人人都知道这里是我们的新领土了。

original: {Proud}I hear we straightened up a band of thugs in Freeside.
translation: {Proud}听说自由城原来的那帮暴徒弃暗投明了。

original: {Hopeful}I hear a troublesome Legion camp got razed to the ground!
translation: {Hopeful}听说又有个讨厌的军团营地被夷为平地了！

original: {Rueful}Our forces suffered a huge blow at Forlorn Hope, We'll remember that!
translation: {Rueful}我们的部队在飘零希望营地遭受了巨大的打击，我们不会忘记的！

original: {Great Khans unaltered/helping Caesar}I've heard rumors that one of the tribes west of the river may join the Legion.
translation: {Great Khans unaltered/helping Caesar}据传有一个河西岸的部落可能会加入军团。

original: {Kings resolve differences with NCR}I never thought I'd see the day when the NCR and the Kings started getting along.
translation: {猫王帮 resolve differences with NCR}我从没想过有一天NCR和猫王帮会走到一起。

original: Looks like we booted the Legion outta Nelson. About damn time.
translation: 看来我们把军团赶出纳尔逊了。也该是时候了。

original: Don't get many chances to catch a legionary alive. Burns me up that we botched ours.
translation: 活捉军团士兵的机会本来就少。好不容易抓到一个却被我们自己给弄死了，真让人窝火。

original: I heard we captured a live Centurion and then let him get away. That never would've happened if I was in charge.
translation: 听说我们活捉了一名百夫长，又让他跑了。这事让我来办，是绝不可能搞砸的。

original: We won't go quietly. The Legion can count on that.
translation: 我们不会善罢甘休的。军团就等着瞧吧。

original: First Recon's at Camp Forlorn Hope. Now we've got a chance to hold it.
translation: 第一侦察营已经进驻飘零希望营地。这下我们守住的机会就大了。

original: Nelson's back in our hands. I hope we can defend it this time.
translation: 纳尔逊回到了我们手中。希望这次能守住它。

original: Sickens me that the Legion would try to harvest slaves from a refugee camp.
translation: 军团居然直接从难民营抓奴隶，真让我恶心。

original: Can't tell you how glad I am you butchered the Fiends. Caravans across the wastes are going to be buying you drinks for years.
translation: 你杀光恶魔帮的时候，别提我有多高兴了。废土上好多商队都会愿意为了这事请你喝上几年的酒的。

original: {New Line}You got that old robot up and running again? How is it working out for you?
translation: {New Line}你让那个旧机器人重新运作起来了？你是怎么办到的？

original: {Angry}Head voices don't *like* you, squishy man!
translation: {Angry}脑子里的声音不*喜欢*你，软软人！

original: {Jealous}No! Head voices don't talk to you. Only to me!
translation: {Jealous}不！脑子里的声音不会和你说话。只会和我说话！

original: {Amused}Those Omertas. Always plotting, never relevant. Bravo for putting them in their place like that.
translation: {Amused}黑手党那些人，只会耍些阴谋诡计，从来成不了大事。你把他们除掉真是大快人心。

original: It sounds like the Kings made nice with the NCR in Freeside. Seems there was room for two flies on the same bit of dung after all.
translation: 听说猫王帮和NCR在自由城和睦相处了。看来一山还是容得下二虎的。

original: If the King is working with the NCR, he must have a damn good reason. I just hope it doesn't come back to bite us.
translation: 如果猫王决定和NCR合作，那他肯定是有充分的理由的。我只是希望我们不会被反咬一口。

original: We keep an eye out for Legion raiding parties. They'd love to shut down the Dorado.
translation: 我们一直在提防军团的突袭小队。他们肯定会袭击多拉多。

original: Be sure to offer words of encouragement to NCR men and women in uniform. Vegas appreciates their business.
translation: 请务必向身着NCR制服的人们表达鼓励。维加斯感谢他们的努力。

original: Welcome to Vegas. Don't make trouble.
translation: 欢迎光临维加斯。请遵纪守法。

original: We're near a Legion slave camp now. I've... been here before.
translation: 我们现在接近一个军团奴隶营地了。我……来过这里。

original: Let's get one thing straight. I see any crimson, I'm taking the shot. You don't like that, you're on your own.
translation: 我先声明，只要我看见一丁点红色，就立马开枪。你不喜欢，那我们一拍两散。

original: set VDialogueCraigBoone.bWarnCottonwoodCove to 2;
We're getting close to Nelson. Any closer, I'm shooting any legionary I see. Hope that's not a problem.
translation: 我们快到纳尔逊了。如果继续前进，那我只要看到军团士兵就会马上开火。希望你不会有意见。

original: Set VDialogueCraigBoone.bWarnNelson to 2;
Hey. I want to thank you for bringing me to Bitter Springs. Things seem... clearer now.
translation: 嘿，我要谢谢你带我来苦泉。事情现在……似乎明朗多了。

original: I assume this is about something important? You're interrupting my research.
translation: 我姑且假设，你是有很重要的事要找我？你打扰到我的研究了。

original: I wanted to thank you for stopping the Omertas. That could have gone poorly for us if it wasn't for you.
translation: 我要感谢你阻止了黑手党的计划。没有你，我们都会遭殃的。

original: I can't believe it's gone. It's all gone. How the fuck did this happen?
translation: 真不敢相信就这样没了。全没了。这他妈的到底是怎么回事？

original: I bet it feels real nice to be carrying those weapons around on the Strip.
translation: 我敢打赌，能带着武器在长街转悠，那感觉肯定很棒。

original: That damn Mr. House has forbid any NCR military personnel from carrying any sort of firearms on the Strip. Well, except for Captain Pappas.
translation: 该死的豪斯先生禁止NCR的军事人员携带任何武器进入长街。呃，除了帕帕斯队长。

original: Mr. House still doesn't trust the NCR. A word of advice, the Securitrons won't put up with any funny stuff out there, so don't do anything stupid.
translation: 豪斯先生还是不信任NCR。给你个建议：那些电子保安可不是摆设，千万别干傻事。

original: This your first time on the Strip?
translation: 你是第一次来长街吗？

original: If Caesar's dead, why ain't the NCR taking care of regular folks yet?
translation: 如果凯撒已经死了，那为什么NCR还这么不待见老百姓呢？

original: You hear Caesar's dead? Good for trade if the Legion goes away, that's for sure.
translation: 你听说凯撒死了吗？如果少了军团，那对生意肯定是百利而无一害的。

original: If the NCR ain't got to worry about Caesar no more, it should worry about improving the lives of regular folks around here.
translation: 如果NCR不用再担心凯撒了，那他们就该关心关心怎么改善老百姓的生活。

original: How's the NCR gonna protect Vegas if it can't even protect its own President?
translation: 如果NCR连自己的总统都保护不了，他们凭什么来保护维加斯？

original: The NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, put a gun in his mouth. Think he would've done that if the NCR stood a chance at beating the Legion?
translation: NCR的王牌游骑兵军士长汉隆，饮弹自尽了。你想想，如果NCR有一丝打败军团的希望，他会这么做吗？

original: Turns out the NCR's top Ranger was a traitor! If the Legion can turn a man like Hanlon, what chance has the NCR got?
translation: 没想到NCR的游骑兵首长居然是叛徒！如果军团连汉隆这样的人都能策反，NCR还有什么希望？

original: Those Fiend junkies over at Vault 3 been taking some hits. I say kill them all.
translation: 3号避难所的那帮恶魔帮垃圾被收拾掉了。要我说，就该杀光他们。

original: The NCR took back Nelson. Maybe they can win this war after all.
translation: NCR夺回了纳尔逊。他们也许最终能赢下这场战争。

original: First the Legion takes Nelson, then it wipes out Camp Forlorn Hope. The NCR don't stand a chance.
translation: 军团先是拿下了纳尔逊，然后又扫荡了飘零希望营地。NCR大势已去。

original: {Angry Disappointment}We're heading back home. I hope our troops do the same. This land can't be saved.
translation: {Angry Disappointment}我们要回家了。希望我们的军队也能一起回去。这片土地没救了。

original: {Sorrowful}Trying to grow crops in this heat, with so little water, is bad enough, but now we've got radiation seeping into the farmlands east of New Vegas.
translation: {Sorrowful}在这种又热又缺水的地方种庄稼已经够糟了，现在我们在新维加斯以东的农田又受了辐射污染。

original: {Angry Disappointment}We're done. Let the people of this hell-hole deal with their problems, I say.
translation: {Angry Disappointment}我们受够了。要我说，就让这鬼地方的人去自生自灭吧。

original: {Pessimistic Resignation}Can't help thinking that we've not seen the last of the Fiends yet.
translation: {Pessimistic Resignation}有时候我忍不住会想，我们怕是看不到恶魔帮死光的那一天了。

original: {Pessimistic Resignation}Caesar's death don't change shit down here.
translation: {Pessimistic Resignation}凯撒的死能对这里有个屁的影响。

original: If there's war in the end, it won't affect our city.
translation: 就算以后真打仗，也影响不到我们的城市。

original: Rumors of imminent war have made it all the way down here.
translation: 这里谣言四起，都说战争要打响了。

original: {Indolent}Going to stay down here until all the trouble outside blows over.
translation: {Indolent}在外面的麻烦事结束前，我还是躲在这里比较好。

original: Looks like the entire region's going straight where we are - knee-deep in shit.
translation: 感觉这地方的人就快和我们差不多了，都一脚踩进膝盖深的屎里。

original: {Slight Sarcasm}I bet NCR troops can't wait to clean the sewers.
translation: {Slight Sarcasm}我敢打赌NCR的部队已经等不及要清理下水道了。

original: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR should head back to their lands, I'm sure *their* people miss them.
translation: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR应该回老家去，*他们的*人民肯定想死他们了。

original: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR came all the way to save us, huh? Guess they missed the shit-holes.
translation: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR大老远跑来救我们？我猜他们肯定是没看见这些粪坑。

original: {Hopeful}I'm glad the President is still here to help us settle in these new territories.
translation: {Hopeful}很高兴总统能帮助我们在这片土地上定居。

original: {Violent}Even without our President, we won't leave the new territories!
translation: {Violent}即使没有总统，我们也不会离开新领土！

original: {Arrogant}As we've done with the Fiends, we'll kill anyone who resists our fight for peace.
translation: {Arrogant}阻碍我们和平大业的人终将被消灭，恶魔帮就是明证。

original: {Visibly Disturbed}Legion attacking so far from their bases means we'll have to watch out on the road.
translation: {Visibly Disturbed}军团竟然已经如此深入腹地了，看来我们外出得小心些。

original: {Arrogant}Nelson will serve as example. We'll bleed the ground red with anyone who opposes our peace-efforts.
translation: {Arrogant}谁敢妨碍我们的和平大业，就让他的鲜血染红大地。纳尔逊就是证明。

original: {Bewildered Anger}You'll pay for what you did to our soldiers at Forlorn Hope, murderer!
translation: {Bewildered Anger}你要为我们牺牲在飘零希望营地的士兵们偿命，凶手！

original: {Bewildered Anger}What on earth could push you to destroy Forlorn Hope?
translation: {Bewildered Anger}究竟是什么天杀的原因让你摧毁了飘零希望营地？

original: {Player in NCR gear}Howdy, trooper. I thought the Big Horn was off limits to you guys, but who am I to complain? A customer is a customer.
translation: {Player in NCR gear}你好啊，长官。我以为上司不准你们进大角酒吧呢，但我又有什么好抱怨的？来者都是客。

original: Perimeter's been quiet since you left. The Fiends are running scared. I doubt they'll give us any more trouble, not for a long while.
translation: 你离开以后周边都还算太平。恶魔帮都被吓跑了。我猜他们得有一段时间不敢露面了。

original: I heard you killed Driver Nephi. My team would've liked to get a shot at him... but we're still glad he's dead.
translation: 我听说你干掉了球杆尼法。虽然我的手下很想亲自给他来一枪……不过我们还是很高兴他已经死了。

original: if (GetObjectiveDisplayed VMS12 31 == 1) && (GetObjectiveCompleted VMS12 31 == 0)\n  SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS12 31 0\nendif
{Cook-Cook dead}Heard you got Cook-Cook. I hope you roasted that bastard with his own flamer.
translation: {Cook-Cook dead}听说你干掉了大厨库克。希望你是用那个混蛋的火焰喷射器烧死了他。

original: Did you hear about that Legion POW escape? I don't like our chances of taking him alive twice.
translation: 你听说军团战俘逃跑的事情了吗？我想再次活捉他的希望不大。

original: How could we lose Kimball at a time like this?
translation: 我们怎么能在眼下这种关头失去金博尔？

original: Without Camp Forlorn Hope, it's a matter of time before the Legion surrounds us at the Dam.
translation: 没了飘零希望营地，我们在水坝被军团合围就只是时间问题。

original: That POW escape presents some real security concerns. That was our base camp, for crying out loud.
translation: 战俘逃亡暴露出来的是实实在在的安保隐患。搞什么鬼，那可是我们的大本营。

original: No hope of securing the border now that Forlorn Hope fell.
translation: 飘零希望营地沦陷了，边境保不住了。

original: With House dead, we'll have Vegas annexed before the year's out.
translation: 既然豪斯死了，我们在新年之前就能吞并维加斯。

original: Not bad. You're lucky I was drawing their fire, otherwise you would have been chewed up.
translation: 不错。幸好我吸引了他们的火力，否则你都死好几回了。

original: I sent one of my guys back to the King to report what happened. You should head back. He'll probably want to thank you.
translation: 我已经派人向猫王报告情况了。你应该马上回去，他说不定要感谢你呢。

original: The King just sent a messenger over, saying these guys are off-limits. He's probably already heard about what you did here.
translation: 猫王刚捎来口信，不许我们再和这些家伙有任何瓜葛。估计他已经听说你在这里的所作所为了。

original: Looks like you get to be a hero. Enjoy it while it lasts.
translation: 看来你成了一名英雄。尽情享受这点威风吧。

original: Why the hell are you here? I got this under control!
translation: 你他妈怎么还在这里？我已经控制住局面了！

original: Why are you talking to me? Smoke these guys already!
translation: 你还和我说什么话？快干掉这些家伙！

original: Good, you're here. These soldier boys don't kid around. They must have had a lookout posted and spotted us coming.
translation: 你来了，很好。这些大兵不是开玩笑的。他们肯定早就埋伏好了，就等我们自己送上门。

original: They took out two of my guys right away, and now the rest are too scared to move in. That leaves you.
translation: 我们一下就被干掉了两个人，剩下的人全成了缩头乌龟。现在只能靠你了。

original: Look, Rexie, someone new's come to see us. {Sighs}Poor boy. He hasn't been feeling well lately. I'm the King. What can I do for you?
translation: 瞧啊，雷克斯，咱们有客人了。{Sighs}可怜的孩子，他最近一直不舒服。我就是猫王。你有何贵干？

original: That's strange, I don't see ol' Rexie with you. He usually comes back here whenever he's not with you. Where'd he get to?
translation: 真是奇怪，老雷克斯没和你在一起。平常他只要没跟着你，就会回到这儿来。他去哪儿了？

original: My eyes on the street tell me you haven't paid our mutual friend Orris a visit yet. Until you do, we got nothing to talk about.
translation: 我的眼线告诉我，你还没去拜访我们的朋友欧里斯。事情办妥以前我们没什么好说的。

original: Things have been a lot better since you helped with those soldier boys. Thanks again. So, what can I do for you?
translation: 你摆平了那些阿兵哥以后，情况改观了不少。再次感谢你。所以，有什么我能帮忙的？

original: {Matter of fact}That was a real mess the Omertas were looking to create. {grateful, long glaaad}Glad you could get all that sorted.
translation: {Matteroffact}黑手党的人就是来搞破坏的。{grateful,longglaaad}还好你把他们都摆平了。

original: {financially strained, but relieved}May have cost me some business, but at least we avoided a shitstorm.
translation: 虽然我可能会少挣一点，但至少我们逃过了一劫。

original: {back to business}Anything I can get {ya}you?
translation: {backtobusiness}要来点什么{ya}？

original: {Ambivalent sigh}I'm not sure how to feel about the Kings and NCR sorting out their differences, but as long as business keeps up, I'm a happy man.
translation: {Ambivalentsigh}猫王帮和NCR化干戈为玉帛了，我不知该作何感想，但只要生意好做，我也无所谓。

original: {back to business}Now what can I {getcha}get you?
translation: {backtobusiness}你想来点什么{getcha}？

original: Move along.
translation: 走开。

original: {Disgusted}Damn monorail bombing. I {spose}suppose this means we'll be seeing more NCR chumps wandering through Freeside.
translation: {Disgusted}该死的列车爆炸。我看这意味着今后会在自由城看见更多NCR草包了。

original: {Reticent}Hate to say it, but business has improved since the troopers started coming through Freeside to get to Vegas.
translation: {Reticent}虽然我不想承认，但自从士兵们开始通过自由城进入维加斯以后，生意明显好多了。

original: So the great {Kai-zar}Caesar is dead. Happy news, but I don't know that it'll make things safer. The rest of his goons may be even worse once they take power.
translation: 伟大的{Kai-zar}凯撒死了。好消息，但我觉得局势并不会就此好转。一旦权力落到他那些部下手上，情况可能会更糟。

original: Word on the street is that the leader of the Legion bought it. Too bad, someone was finally going to do something about all the NCR around here.
translation: 据说军团的首领死了。太糟了，我还指望有人能收拾这里的NCR呢。

original: You hear the Legion attacked Bitter Springs? If we're lucky, the NCR will pull some of their soldiers away from here and send them that way.
translation: 你听说军团攻击了苦泉镇没有？如果我们运气好的话，NCR会从这地方调一些士兵到那里去。

original: If you had asked me a month ago, I'd have said we'd never willingly work with the NCR. But look at us now.
translation: 要是放在一个月以前，我们死都不会勾搭NCR。可你看看现在。

original: I still can't believe the King agreed to work with the NCR. But he's the King, and the King knows best.
translation: 我还是不能相信猫王竟然同意与NCR合作。但他是猫王，猫王的决定总是正确的。

original: So far working with the NCR hasn't been too bad. If anything, things seem to be getting better.
translation: 到目前为止，与NCR的合作还不算太糟。非要说的话，情况似乎在好转。

original: The Squatters have been more and more trouble lately.
translation: 那些流民最近越来越爱惹事了。

original: Squatters aren't happy about the water rationing, but then when are they ever happy?
translation: 流民对淡水的配给量不是很满意，可他们什么时候满意过？

original: ; Need to conditionalize for when the player\n; makes the pump cheaper.
Thank god the Followers are here. I'd probably be dead now if it weren't for their doctors.
translation: 感谢上帝，这儿还有天启追随者。要不是他们的医生，我早就死了。

original: HELIOS will be ours again someday.
translation: 总有一天我们会夺回太阳神一号的。

original: setStage vDialogueEDE 10
It pains me to think of the scientific wonders at HELIOS One, now in NCR hands.
translation: 每当想到太阳神一号这样的科学奇迹落在了NCR手里，我就心痛。

original: setStage vDialogueEDE 10
You've been outside. Is the NCR really still hunting us?
translation: 你在外面呆过。NCR真的还在追杀我们吗？

original: {Player attacked NCR, NCR troops not all dead}Kill every last one of those NCR troopers and then we'll talk.
translation: {Player attacked NCR, NCR troops not all dead}你去把NCR突击兵都杀光了再来找我。

original: We've got a situation with some Great Khans right now. The brass at McCarran has ordered me to lock down the ruins until it's been resolved.
translation: 我们和几个大汗帮的人闹出了一点状况。麦卡伦的长官命令我封锁这片废墟，直到问题解决。

original: {Sneak path - hostages dead}I'm sorry you couldn't get either hostage out alive, but that's how it goes sometimes. Thanks for your help.
translation: {Sneak path - hostages dead}很遗憾你没能把人质救出来，但有时候现实就是这样。谢谢你的帮助。

original: {Legion victory}{fear}I've been trying to sort out the rumors from the facts, but with the Legion coming, I guess it doesn't matter. The news is all bad.
translation: {Legionvictory}{fear}我也试过辨别谣言，不过随着军团的进犯，这些都无关紧要了。反正都是坏消息。

original: {Other victory}{puzzled}Lots of confusion over the radio. Somehow the NCR lost the Dam, but the Legion didn't get it, either?
translation: {Othervictory}{puzzled}越听收音机越糊涂。好像NCR丢了水坝，可占领水坝的却不是军团？

original: We're all going to die out here. They're out there right now, waiting for us... waiting to kill us.
translation: 我们都会死在这里。他们现在就在外面，等着我们…等着杀了我们。

original: We're all fucked!
translation: 我们全完蛋了！

original: {Player in NCR gear}No run-ins with the Great Khans, I hope? They've been more restless than usual.
translation: {Player in NCR gear}没和大汗帮发生冲突吧？最近他们比以前更嚣张了。

original: {Player not in NCR gear}This area isn't safe for civilians. You don't want to get caught by the Great Khans.
translation: {Player not in NCR gear}对平民来说，这个地区可不太平。小心别被大汗帮给撞见。

original: If Mister House ain't the top dog on the Strip, whaddya suppose that means for us?
translation: 你有没有想过，如果豪斯先生不是长街的老大，对我们意味着什么？

original: Ain't seen no soldier boys for a while. Guess they're all scared of coming out after that big boom.
translation: 有阵子没看见那些大兵哥了。估计是那场大爆炸吓得他们都不敢出来了。

original: Looks like the troops are back. Good thing, too, this place was deadsville without their caps.
translation: 看来那些军队又回来了。也好，这地方要是少了他们的瓶盖子，可就死气沉沉的了。

original: {Caesar dead}Someone took out the Legion's boss. Doubt it'll stop them for long, though.
translation: {Caesar dead}有人干掉了军团的老大。但我认为这并不会延缓他们扩张的脚步。

original: Lem wants to run back to the NCR and turn himself in, spineless bastard.
translation: 莱姆打算找NCR自首，软骨头的废物。

original: I hear the Great Khans are pretty tough, I hope we can join them.
translation: 我听说大汗帮相当厉害，希望我们可以加入他们。

original: Join the Great Khans, what the hell is Cooke thinking?
translation: 加入大汗帮？库克到底在他妈想些什么？

original: I don't know about this whole Great Khan thing...
translation: 我不太了解这个所谓的大汗帮……

original: {Apprehensive}After what happened to Mr. House, nobody knows for sure what's in play for the Strip.
translation: {Apprehensive}豪斯先生的事发生后，没人知道长街接下来还会有什么好戏。

original: {Proud}Nelson'll turn this war around.
translation: {Proud}纳尔逊会是这场战争的转折点。

original: {Smug}Let's see those fuckers attack Hoover Dam now.
translation: {Smug}看看那些混蛋现在还敢不敢进攻胡佛水坝。

original: {Monorail Destroyed}Careless of the NCR to let their monorail get blown up. Don't they have sentries standing watch?
translation: {Monorail Destroyed}由于NCR的粗心大意，他们的单轨列车被人炸毁了。难道他们就没派人看守吗？

original: {Caesar dead}The Legion isn't going to go away just because Caesar is dead, if the rumor is even true.
translation: {Caesar dead}就算谣言属实，军团也不会因为凯撒死了就全线撤退。

original: {Legion at Nelson wiped out}It's always good for business when the NCR scores a victory like the one at Nelson.
translation: {Legion at Nelson wiped out}NCR在纳尔逊取得了大捷，这对我们的生意可是大有好处。

original: {NCR at Camp Forlorn Hope wiped out}Damn shame about Camp Forlorn Hope.
translation: {NCR at Camp 飘零希望营地 wiped out}飘零希望营地的事真叫人惋惜。

original: {Grateful}Thanks for handling the Fiends. One less pack of dogs to hurt the troops.
translation: {Grateful}谢谢你端掉了恶魔帮。少了这帮野狗，士兵们就安全多了。

original: The Legion being wiped out at Nelson gave us some breathing room - hopefully the brass will use that.
translation: 盘踞在纳尔逊的军团被铲除了，我们也可以喘口气了——希望长官能让我们休整一下。

original: Losing Forlorn Hope was a real blow to us - I hope things can be turned around soon.
translation: 飘零希望的失守对我们来说是个不小的打击——希望事态不久之后能有转机。

original: Hell of a thing at Nelson - NCR and the Legion wiped out. I wonder what the hell happened.
translation: 纳尔逊发生了什么——NCR和军团都被干掉了。我想知道到底怎么回事。

original: I have a report here that says the Legion forces at Nelson have been taken care of and that you had a hand in it.
translation: 我接到报告说，纳尔逊的军团部队已经被剿灭了，这其中有你一份功劳。

original: You have my thanks for that. Those guys have been giving us a lot of trouble for a long time now.
translation: 谢谢你。那些家伙一直都在给我们找麻烦。

original: Now that they're gone, we'll be able to prepare for the upcoming conflict at Hoover Dam.
translation: 既然现在搞定了他们，我们就可以专心为胡佛水坝之战做准备了。

original: set VMS30.iTalkedToPolatli to 1
If you're heading out, be careful. There's been lots of Legion raiding parties around lately.
translation: 如果你要出去，小心点。最近这里到处都是军团的劫掠小队。

original: No time to talk. I have to keep watch for Legion raiding parties.
translation: 我得提防军团的劫掠小队，没时间闲聊。

original: Watch yourself, we got hit by a Legion raiding party just the other night.
translation: 你自己多小心吧，前两天晚上我们就遭到过军团劫掠队的袭击。

original: One of my buddies said that he saw Caesar out rallying the Legion. If that's true, we're definitely screwed.
translation: 我有个兄弟说他看见凯撒正在集结军团。要是真的，那我们就死定了。

original: Holy shit! Did you hear that Caesar is dead? Maybe we actually have a fighting chance now.
translation: 我的天！你听说凯撒已经死了吗？也许我们现在有翻身的机会了。

original: I heard Chief Hanlon is dead. How are we going to fight the Legion without him?
translation: 听说汉隆军士长死了。没了他我们还怎么对付军团？

original: Some of the other guys told me that the Legion troops eat their own dead to gain their strength, but they're kidding, right?
translation: 有人告诉我，军团士兵会吃自己战友的尸体来补充体力，他们是在逗我玩呢，对吗？

original: I got bit by one of those dirty dogs the Legion has. I wonder if they've got rabies... maybe I should see Dr. Richards.
translation: 我被军团的那些脏狗给咬了。不会得狂犬病吧……我得找理查兹医生给看看。

original: Major Polatli is putting everyone on double shifts to make up for recent losses to the Legion. That guy never gives up.
translation: 波拉特里少校给所有人都排了双班岗，以弥补最近我们在与军团作战中损失的人力。那家伙真是不饶人啊。

original: We are so fucked here! How can we ever hope to fight off the entire Legion?
translation: 我们完蛋了！我们怎么能打败整个军团？

original: Another day, another battle, another dead trooper. When is this shit going to end?
translation: 又过一天，又打一仗，又死一人。这他妈什么时候才到头？

original: It seems like for every Legion soldier we kill, two more take his place. How many of them are there?
translation: 怎么我们每干掉一个军团士兵，就会又冒出两个人来。他们哪来这么多人？

original: The last patrol I was on got hit by a Legion raiding party and I barely survived. I don't want to go back out there again.
translation: 我上次巡逻的时候受到了军团劫掠小队的袭击，差点就回不来了。我再也不想出去巡逻了。

original: How do they expect us to fight the Legion with only the crappy equipment and gear they gave us?
translation: 就他们发的那点破烂装备，还指望我们去和军团打？

original: I don't know how we're going to hold off the Legion here and at Hoover Dam, we just don't have the manpower.
translation: 真不知道该怎么在这里和胡佛水坝挡住军团，我们人手真的不够。

original: The Legion is assembling a massive army on the other side of the river. How can we stop an army when we can't even handle their raiding parties?
translation: 军团正在河对岸集结主力部队。我们连他们的劫掠小队都应付不了，怎么挡得住整支大军？

original: {Regretful}So, Keene's dead. Knew it might come to that some day. {Beat, slight weariness}Makes things difficult for the town.
translation: {Regretful}这么说，基恩死了。我就知道迟早会有这一天的。{Beat,slightweariness}这下镇子更难过了。

original: Without Keene, it'll be hard to convince other Nightkin in the wasteland to come here. And harder to get the ones here to stay.
translation: 没有基恩，再想说服废土上的其他夜行族迁来这里就更困难了。已经来了的人也会待不下去的。

original: We don't even need this place. But it sure scares the shit out of the NCR that we've got a base here.
translation: 其实我们根本不需要这里，但在这里设个基地，能把那些NCR的尿都吓出来。

original: The NCR left its soldiers here to die. Must be their strategy for the whole war.
translation: NCR把那些士兵留在这等死，肯定是出于全局战略的考虑。

original: I'm glad the troopers are smart enough not to trample everything.
translation: 还好士兵们没把庄稼全踩烂。

original: Spotted some humans down the road. Could be Great Khans again.
translation: 我在路上碰到了一些人类。搞不好又是大汗帮的人。

original: {Imminent Cure}A cure for the Nightkin is supposed to be on the way.
translation: {Imminent Cure}治愈夜行族的疗法就快完成了。

original: {Eventual Cure}I heard it'll still be some time before the Nightkin are cured. Hope they stick around that long.
translation: {Eventual Cure}听说还需要些时间才能研究出夜行族的治疗方法。希望他们能等到那时候。

original: {Keene dead}The Nightkin aren't going to stick around long with Keene dead. Not without a good reason, anyway.
translation: {Keene dead}基恩死了，夜行族不会再待下去了。至少，没有个好理由，是不会再待下去了。

original: {Keene left}The Nightkin aren't going to stick around long now that Keene's left. Not without a good reason, anyway.
translation: {Keene dead}基恩走了，夜行族不会再待下去了。至少，没有好理由，是不会再待了。

original: Better watch out. Lily's been babbling about her grandkids again.
translation: 咱们最好小心点。莉莉又开始念叨她的孙子孙女了。

original: Hey, thanks for all the help back there.
translation: 嘿，感谢你对我的帮助。

original: Well! That was quite an adventure. We taught those convicts a thing or two, didn't we?
translation: 嗨呀！可真刺激。我们也算是给那帮恶棍一点颜色瞧瞧了，对吧？

original: Breaking myself out of a hostage situation - not to diminish your role in it, of course - but it was quite thrilling.
translation: 瞧，我自己一人就逃出来了——当然，你的作用也不可否认啦，想想还真是惊心动魄啊。

original: Problem is, there's still no law in Primm. What're we to do the next time ruffians menace us and hold us hostage?
translation: 问题是，普瑞姆依旧是个无法无天的地方，下次那些暴徒再威胁我们，把我们绑架了该怎么办？

original: Well! That was quite a per-dicament you rescued me from, there in the Bison Steve. A most unpleasant experience.
translation: 哎哟！还好你把我从野牛史蒂夫那破地方捞出来。这段经历可真够不愉快的。

original: Going in alone to rescue a hostage! My brother-in-law was brave like that. Made a fine sheriff. Until the Powder Gangers killed him.
translation: 单枪匹马杀进去救人，我姐夫活着的时候就这么勇敢。他是个称职的好警长，可惜最后却死在了炸药帮的手上。

original: Problem is, there's still no law in Primm. What're we to do the next time ruffians menace us and hold us hostage?
translation: 问题是，普瑞姆依旧是个无法无天的地方，下次那些暴徒再威胁我们，把我们绑架了该怎么办？

original: Hello again. I don't suppose you've decided to help Primm find its next sheriff?
translation: 你好啊。你还没有决定为普瑞姆寻找下任警长吧？

original: Any luck finding a suitable candidate for our next sheriff?
translation: 找到我们下任警长的人选了吗？

original: Hello
translation: 你好。

original: {Hopeful}I'm glad the President is still here to help us settle in these new territories.
translation: {Hopeful}很高兴总统能帮助我们在这片土地上定居。

original: True to {KAI-zar}Caesar.
translation: 凯撒{KAI-zar}万岁。

original: Someone blew up the monorail the NCR uses to travel to the Strip and back. We should use this time to strike!
translation: 有人把NCR用于往返长街的单轨铁路炸了。我们应该抓住这个时机进攻！

original: Seems the destruction of the monorail didn't slow the NCR down much. How many troops do they have?
translation: 看样子列车的事故并没有给NCR造成太多麻烦。他们到底有多少部队？

original: Seems the NCR is making friends. We've had reports of them making overtures to some gang in Freeside.
translation: 看来NCR正在结交朋友。我们得到报告说他们正在主动联系自由城的一些帮派。

original: We just had word that the town of Primm is now part of the NCR. At this rate, they'll be running the whole region soon.
translation: 我们刚刚得到消息，普瑞姆已经成为NCR的一部分了。照这个势头发展下去，他们要不了多久就会占领整片地区。

original: You made a real mess of the Omertas. Looks like the place will be under new management now.
translation: 你把整个黑手党搅得鸡犬不宁。看来那地方是该换新主人了。

original: People say Caesar is dead. I hope someone worse doesn't replace him.
translation: 大家都说凯撒死了。希望别来一个更坏的人接班。

original: At least the local vendors are seeing more business with these wealthy NCR shits wandering through.
translation: 这些富得流油的NCR杂毛只能从这里走，至少本地商人的生意会好转。

original: I hear some Legionary named Silus got freed from McCarran. He's got quite the NCR kill count.
translation: 听说军团有个叫希鲁斯的人从麦卡伦逃脱了。他杀了NCR不少人呢。

original: Looks like we booted the Legion outta Nelson. About damn time.
translation: 看来我们把军团赶出纳尔逊了。也该是时候了。

original: Don't get many chances to catch a legionary alive. Burns me up that we botched ours.
translation: 活捉军团士兵的机会本来就少。好不容易抓到却弄死了，真让人搓火。

original: I heard we captured a live Centurion and then let him get away. That never would've happened if I was in charge.
translation: 听说我们活捉了一名百夫长，又让他跑了。这事让我来办，是绝不可能搞砸的。

original: {Irked}No monorail access to the Strip? Where am I supposed to take my leave? Freeside?
translation: {Irked}通往长街的单轨列车没了？那我以后该从哪儿走呢？自由城吗？

original: We won't go quietly. The Legion can count on that.
translation: 我们不会善罢甘休的。军团就等着瞧吧。

original: First Recon's at Camp Forlorn Hope. Now we've got a chance to hold it.
translation: 第一侦察营已经入驻飘零希望营地。这下我们守住的机会就大了。

original: Nelson's back in our hands. I hope we can defend it this time.
translation: 纳尔逊又回到我们手中了。希望这次能守住它。

original: Sickens me that the Legion would try to harvest slaves from a refugee camp.
translation: 军团居然直接从难民营抓奴隶，真让我恶心。

original: {Amused}Those Omertas. Always plotting, never relevant. Bravo for putting them in their place like that.
translation: {Amused}黑手党那些人，只会耍些阴谋诡计，从来成不了大事。你把他们除掉真是大快人心。

original: It sounds like the Kings made nice with the NCR in Freeside. Seems there was room for two flies on the same bit of dung after all.
translation: 听说猫王帮和NCR在自由城和睦相处了。看来一山还是容得下二虎的。

original: {Pessimistic Resignation}Can't help thinking that we've not seen the last of the Fiends yet.
translation: {Pessimistic Resignation}有时候我忍不住会想，我们怕是看不到恶魔帮死光的那一天了。

original: {Pessimistic Resignation}Caesar's death don't change shit down here.
translation: {Pessimistic Resignation}凯撒死了也无法改变这堆烂摊子。

original: The wind's changing. I can see trouble ahead.
translation: 风向变了。我觉得有麻烦了。

original: If there's war in the end, it won't affect our city.
translation: 就算真打仗，也影响不到我们的城市。

original: Rumors of imminent war have made it all the way down here.
translation: 打仗的谣言已经传到这下面来了。

original: {Indolent}Going to stay down here until all the trouble outside blows over.
translation: {Indolent}在外面的麻烦事结束前，我还是躲在这里比较好。

original: Looks like the entire region's going straight where we are - knee-deep in shit.
translation: 看来整片地区都要一脚踩进臭屎坑里了。

original: {Slight Sarcasm}I bet NCR troops can't wait to clean the sewers.
translation: {Slight Sarcasm}我敢打赌NCR的部队已经等不及要清理下水道了。

original: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR came all the way to save us, huh? Guess they missed the shit-holes.
translation: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR大老远地跑来救我们，嗯？那我猜他们肯定是没看见这些粪坑。

original: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR should head back to their lands, I'm sure *their* people miss them.
translation: {Slight Sarcasm}NCR应该回老家去，*他们的*人民肯定想死他们了。

original: Fuck, where are we gonna get our shit from now that the Khans are all buddy buddy with the NCR?
translation: 操，大汗帮都和NCR称兄道弟了，我们以后从哪儿搞药啊。 ?

original: Fuck, where are we gonna get our shit from now that the Khans are all buddy buddy with the NCR?
translation: 操，大汗帮都和NCR称兄道弟了，我们以后从哪儿搞药啊。 ?

original: NCR is going to be rip shit about losing their little train.
translation: 没了小火车，NCR会跟丢了魂一样。

original: We lost Forlorn Hope. The eastern front is collapsing. They'll be here next.
translation: 飘零希望营地失陷了。东线崩溃了，下一个遭殃的估计就是我们了。

original: With Caesar dead, maybe they'll stop attacking us.
translation: 凯撒死了，或许他们会停止攻击了吧。

original: {Proud}NCR should take this chance, now that Mr. House's out of the way.
translation: {Proud}现在豪斯先生已经不再是问题了，NCR应该抓住这个机会。

original: {Relieved}Good riddance, Caesar! We can finally enjoy some R&R without worrying about a Legion attack at McCarran.
translation: {Relieved}凯撒死得好啊！我们终于可以真正休个好假，而不必担心军团进攻麦卡伦了。

original: {Celebratory}Without leadership, the Fiends are as good as dead!
translation: {Celebratory}没了首领，恶魔帮已经和死了没区别了！

original: The Fiends have been less organized with Motor-Runner gone. Good riddance.
translation: 轰鸣恶煞死了以后，恶魔帮就成了一盘散沙。死得好啊。.

original: Shouldn't be long before the Fiends are wiped out, now that their bosses are gone.
translation: 恶魔帮没了老大，应该是时日无多了。

original: The Kings are working with NCR? What's this place coming to?
translation: 猫王帮和NCR合作了？这地方到底怎么了？

original: Fiends are bad for business. NCR should do their fucking job.
translation: 恶魔帮只会搅乱这儿的生意。NCR应该起点作用才是。

original: There's some serious shit going on between NCR and the Legion. They better not fuck with our power.
translation: NCR与军团看起来是非打一场不可了。他们最好别影响我们。

original: Kings sold out to the NCR huh? Might be worth a sit down with them.
translation: 猫王帮把自己卖给NCR了？他们从中捞了不少好处吧。

original: I hear the Legion is moving some new tough muscle into the area. NCR better keep their heads down.
translation: 我听说军团又派了一支精锐部队进驻这个区域。NCR最好小心点。

original: The NCR seems none too happy about losing their little train.
translation: 小火车报废了，NCR不开心了。

original: {Hopeful}I hope the Fiends stop their raids now that their boss is gone.
translation: {Hopeful}我希望这些恶魔帮别再出来打劫了，他们的老大都挂了。.

original: {Slight Relief}Our guys put the Monorail back to work!
translation: {Slight Relief}我们的人修好了单轨列车！

original: {Slight Relief}Our guys put the Monorail back to work!
translation: {Slight Relief}我们的人修好了单轨列车！

original: {Indignated}I hear some asshole freed our enemy from McCarran.
translation: {Indignated}听说有混蛋放了我们关押在麦卡伦的俘虏。

original: {Indignated}I hear some asshole freed our enemy from McCarran.
translation: {Indignated}听说有混蛋放了我们关押在麦卡伦的俘虏。

original: {Assertive}That Fiend leader shouldn't have messed with our great army.
translation: {Assertive}那个恶魔帮的头头不该招惹我们的伟大军队。

original: {Assertive}That Fiend leader shouldn't have messed with our great army.
translation: {Assertive}那个恶魔帮的头头不该招惹我们的伟大军队。

original: {Proud}The Fiends are running for their lives. That'll show everyone what we do to our enemies.
translation: {Proud}恶魔帮的人已经做鸟兽散了。这下敌人该明白我们的实力了。

original: {Worried}If the Legion can reach as far as Bitter Springs, what's going to stop them from getting to us?
translation: {Worried}如果军团的魔爪能触及苦泉镇，还有什么能阻止他们把手伸向我们呢？

original: {Worried}If the Legion can reach as far as Bitter Springs, what's going to stop them from getting to us?
translation: {Worried}如果军团的魔爪能触及苦泉镇，还有什么能阻止他们把手伸向我们呢？

original: {Proud}Those Khans got the hint! We've shown everyone that these are our new territories.
translation: {Proud}大汗帮的人终于开窍了！这下人人都知道这里是我们的新领土了。

original: {Proud}Those Khans got the hint! We've shown everyone that these are our new territories.
translation: {Proud}大汗帮的人终于开窍了！这下人人都知道这里是我们的新领土了。

original: {Hopeful}I hear a troublesome Legion camp got razed to the ground!
translation: {Hopeful}听说又有个讨厌的军团营地被夷为平地了！

original: {Rueful}Our forces suffered a huge blow at Forlorn Hope, We'll remember that!
translation: {Rueful}我们的部队在飘零希望营地遭受了巨大的打击，我们不会忘记的！

original: {Rueful}Our forces suffered a huge blow at Forlorn Hope, We'll remember that!
translation: {Rueful}我们的部队在飘零希望营地遭受了巨大的打击，我们不会忘记的！

original: {Fearful}War doesn't forgive anybody, but what did we do to deserve this?
translation: {Fearful}战争虽然是无情的，可为何我们会遭此报应？

original: {Fearful}War doesn't forgive anybody, but what did we do to deserve this?
translation: {Fearful}战争虽然是无情的，可为何我们会遭此报应？

original: Be sure to offer words of encouragement to NCR men and women in uniform. Vegas appreciates their business.
translation: 请务必向身着NCR制服的人们表达鼓励。维加斯感谢他们的努力。

original: We keep an eye out for Legion raiding parties. They'd love to shut down the Dorado.
translation: 我们一直在提防军团的突袭小队。他们肯定会袭击多拉多。

original: If Caesar's dead, why ain't the NCR taking care of regular folks yet?
translation: 如果凯撒已经死了，那为什么NCR还这么不待见老百姓呢？

original: If Caesar's dead, why ain't the NCR taking care of regular folks yet?
translation: 如果凯撒已经死了，那为什么NCR还这么不待见老百姓呢？

original: You hear Caesar's dead? Good for trade if the Legion goes away, that's for sure.
translation: 你听说凯撒死了吗？如果少了军团，那对生意肯定是百利而无一害的。

original: If the NCR ain't got to worry about Caesar no more, it should worry about improving the lives of regular folks around here.
translation: 如果NCR不用再担心凯撒了，那他们就该关心关心怎么改善老百姓的生活。

original: If the NCR ain't got to worry about Caesar no more, it should worry about improving the lives of regular folks around here.
translation: 如果NCR不用再担心凯撒了，那他们就该关心关心怎么改善老百姓的生活。

original: How's the NCR gonna protect Vegas if it can't even protect its own President?
translation: 如果NCR连他们自己的总统都保护不好，他们凭什么来保卫维加斯？

original: How's the NCR gonna protect Vegas if it can't even protect its own President?
translation: 如果NCR连他们自己的总统都保护不好，他们凭什么来保卫维加斯？

original: The NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, put a gun in his mouth. Think he would've done that if the NCR stood a chance at beating the Legion?
translation: NCR的王牌游骑兵军士长汉隆，饮弹自尽了。你想想，如果NCR有一丝打败军团的希望，他会这么做吗？

original: The NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, put a gun in his mouth. Think he would've done that if the NCR stood a chance at beating the Legion?
translation: NCR的王牌游骑兵军士长汉隆，饮弹自尽了。你想想，如果NCR有一丝打败军团的希望，他会这么做吗？

original: Turns out the NCR's top Ranger was a traitor! If the Legion can turn a man like Hanlon, what chance has the NCR got?
translation: 没想到NCR的游骑兵首长居然是叛徒！如果军团连汉隆这样的人都能策反，NCR还有什么希望？

original: Turns out the NCR's top Ranger was a traitor! If the Legion can turn a man like Hanlon, what chance has the NCR got?
translation: 没想到NCR的游骑兵首长居然是叛徒！如果军团连汉隆这样的人都能策反，NCR还有什么希望？

original: Those Fiend junkies over at Vault 3 been taking some hits. I say kill them all.
translation: 3号避难所的垃圾恶魔帮被人给收拾了。要我说，就该杀光他们。

original: Those Fiend junkies over at Vault 3 been taking some hits. I say kill them all.
translation: 3号避难所的垃圾恶魔帮被人给收拾了。要我说，就该杀光他们。

original: I hear the NCR and the Kings have been getting along. That's good news for Freeside.
translation: 听说NCR和猫王帮握手言和了。这对自由城来说是个好消息。

original: I hear the NCR and the Kings have been getting along. That's good news for Freeside.
translation: 听说NCR和猫王帮握手言和了。这对自由城来说是个好消息。

original: The NCR took back Nelson. Maybe they can win this war after all.
translation: NCR夺回了纳尔逊。他们也许最终能赢下这场战争。

original: The NCR took back Nelson. Maybe they can win this war after all.
translation: NCR夺回了纳尔逊。他们也许最终能赢下这场战争。

original: First the Legion takes Nelson, then it wipes out Camp Forlorn Hope. The NCR don't stand a chance.
translation: 军团先拿下了纳尔逊，然后又扫荡了飘零希望营地。NCR大势已去了。

original: First the Legion takes Nelson, then it wipes out Camp Forlorn Hope. The NCR don't stand a chance.
translation: 军团先拿下了纳尔逊，然后又扫荡了飘零希望营地。NCR大势已去了。

original: Did you hear about that Legion POW escape? I don't like our chances of taking him alive twice.
translation: 你听说军团战俘逃跑的事情了吗？我想再次活捉他的希望不大。

original: How could we lose Kimball at a time like this?
translation: 我们怎么能在这样的时刻失去金博尔？

original: Without Camp Forlorn Hope, it's a matter of time before the Legion surrounds us at the Dam.
translation: 没了飘零希望营地，我们被军团围在水坝就只是时间问题。

original: That POW escape presents some real security concerns. That was our base camp, for crying out loud.
translation: 战俘逃亡暴露出来的是实实在在的安保隐患。搞什么鬼，那可是我们的大本营。

original: No hope of securing the border now that Forlorn Hope fell.
translation: 飘零希望营地失陷了，保住边境彻底无望了。

original: {Hindsight}Should've bet we'd kill the Fiend's leader.
translation: {Hindsight}我就知道我们肯定能拿下恶魔帮的首领的。

original: {Hindsight}Should've bet we'd kill the Fiend's leader.
translation: {Hindsight}我就知道我们肯定能拿下恶魔帮的首领的。

original: {Resigned Fear}They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
translation: {Resigned Fear}他们都说恶魔帮被击败了，但为了以防万一，我还是多和军队走得近一些吧。

original: {Resigned Fear}They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
translation: {Resigned Fear}他们都说恶魔帮被击败了，但为了以防万一，我还是多和军队走得近一些吧。

original: {Cautious}I'll believe that the Fiends are gone when they stop their raiding and pillaging.
translation: {Cautious}除非恶魔帮不再四处作恶，否则我才不相信他们完蛋了。

original: {Cautious}I'll believe that the Fiends are gone when they stop their raiding and pillaging.
translation: {Cautious}除非恶魔帮不再四处作恶，否则我才不相信他们完蛋了。

original: {Cautious}They say it's safer to travel now that Fiends are retreating, but I'd still look out for trouble.
translation: {Cautious}他们说现在旅行安全多了，恶魔帮撤退了，但我还是要多加小心。

original: {Cautious}They say it's safer to travel now that Fiends are retreating, but I'd still look out for trouble.
translation: {Cautious}他们说现在旅行安全多了，恶魔帮撤退了，但我还是要多加小心。

original: {Arrogant}As we've done with the Fiends, we'll kill anyone who resists our fight for peace.
translation: {Arrogant}凡是阻碍我们和平的人最后都会被消灭，恶魔帮就是明证。

original: {Arrogant}As we've done with the Fiends, we'll kill anyone who resists our fight for peace.
translation: {Arrogant}凡是阻碍我们和平的人最后都会被消灭，恶魔帮就是明证。

original: {Visibly Disturbed}Legion attacking so far from their bases means we'll have to watch out on the road.
translation: {Visibly Disturbed}军团竟然已经如此深入腹地了，看来我们外出得小心些了。

original: {Visibly Disturbed}Legion attacking so far from their bases means we'll have to watch out on the road.
translation: {Visibly Disturbed}军团竟然已经如此深入腹地了，看来我们外出得小心些了。

original: {Hopeful}Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
translation: {Hopeful}我们在纳尔逊取得大捷，这一定会成为旅途路上的谈资的。

original: {Hopeful}Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
translation: {Hopeful}我们在纳尔逊取得大捷，这一定会成为旅途路上的谈资的。

original: {Arrogant}Nelson will serve as example. We'll bleed the ground red with anyone who opposes our peace-efforts.
translation: {Arrogant}谁敢妨碍我们的和平，就让他的鲜血染红大地。纳尔逊就是明证。

original: {Arrogant}Nelson will serve as example. We'll bleed the ground red with anyone who opposes our peace-efforts.
translation: {Arrogant}谁敢妨碍我们的和平，就让他的鲜血染红大地。纳尔逊就是明证。

original: {Dumbfounded, Indignated}In all my years, I've never heard of a worse massacre than what happened at Forlorn Hope.
translation: {Dumbfounded, Indignated}我这辈子从未听说像飘零希望营地那样惨绝人寰的大屠杀。

original: {Satisfied}With Caesar out of the way, we'll assert our rule over the territories.
translation: {Satisfied}既然凯撒已经不在了，我们要继续巩固对这片土地的统治。

original: {Satisfied}With Caesar out of the way, we'll assert our rule over the territories.
translation: {Satisfied}既然凯撒已经不在了，我们要继续巩固对这片土地的统治。

original: {Bewildered Anger}The ground in Forlorn Hope was soaked red, from the blood of our own people!
translation: {Bewildered Anger}飘零希望营地的大地都被我们自己人的鲜血染红了！

original: {Bewildered Anger}The ground in Forlorn Hope was soaked red, from the blood of our own people!
translation: {Bewildered Anger}飘零希望营地都被我们自己人的鲜血染红了！

original: {Fearful Apprehension}Forlorn Hope was massacrated. How are the troops going to defend poor sobs like us?
translation: {Fearful Apprehension}飘零希望营地遭到了大屠杀。这样的军队怎么能保护我们老百姓？

original: {Hopeful}Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
translation: {Hopeful}我们在纳尔逊取得了大捷，这下我在路上可有话聊了。

original: {Resigned Fear}They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
translation: {Resigned Fear}他们都说恶魔帮被击败了，但为了以防万一，我还是多和军队走得近一些吧。

original: {Resigned Fear}They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
translation: {Resigned Fear}他们都说恶魔帮被击败了，但为了以防万一，我还是多和军队走得近一些吧。

original: {Resigned Fear}They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
translation: {Resigned Fear}他们都说恶魔帮被击败了，但为了以防万一，我还是多和军队走得近一些吧。

original: {Resigned Fear}They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
translation: {Resigned Fear}他们都说恶魔帮被击败了，但为了以防万一，我还是多和军队走得近一些吧。

original: {Visibly Disturbed}Legion attacking so far from their bases means we'll have to watch out on the road.
translation: {Visibly Disturbed}军团竟然已经如此深入腹地了，看来我们外出得小心些了。

original: {Visibly Disturbed}Legion attacking so far from their bases means we'll have to watch out on the road.
translation: {Visibly Disturbed}军团竟然已经如此深入腹地了，看来我们外出得小心些了。

original: Word on the street is that the leader of the Legion bought it. Too bad, someone was finally going to do something about all the NCR around here.
translation: 据说军团的首领死了。太糟了，我还指望有人能收拾这里的NCR呢。

original: There was some some kind of explosion to the east a little while ago. Has the fighting started?
translation: 东边好像发生了爆炸。是开始打仗了吗？

original: You hear the Legion attacked Bitter Springs? If we're lucky, the NCR will pull some of their soldiers away from here and send them that way.
translation: 你听说军团攻击了苦泉镇没有？如果我们运气好的话，NCR会从这地方调一些士兵到那里去。

original: If you had asked me a month ago, I'd have said we'd never willingly work with the NCR. But look at us now.
translation: 要是放在一个月以前，我们死都不会勾搭NCR。可你看看现在。

original: I still can't believe the King agreed to work with the NCR. But he's the King, and the King knows best.
translation: 我还是不能相信猫王竟然同意与NCR合作。但他是猫王，猫王的决定总是正确的。

original: So far working with the NCR hasn't been too bad. If anything, things seem to be getting better.
translation: 到目前为止，与NCR的合作还不算太糟。非要说的话，情况似乎在好转。

original: {Resigned}If someone can blow up the Monorail, I guess we're not safe even in the Strip.
translation: {Resigned}既然有人能把单轨列车给炸了，那我想我们即使待在长街也不会安全。

original: {Resigned}If someone can blow up the Monorail, I guess we're not safe even in the Strip.
translation: {Resigned}既然有人能把单轨列车给炸了，那我想我们即使待在长街也不会安全。

original: {Apprehensive}After what happened to Mr. House, nobody knows for sure what's in play for the Strip.
translation: {Apprehensive}豪斯先生的事发生后，没人知道长街接下来还会有什么好戏。

original: {Apprehensive}After what happened to Mr. House, nobody knows for sure what's in play for the Strip.
translation: {Apprehensive}豪斯先生的事发生后，没人知道长街接下来还会有什么好戏。

original: Move along.
translation: 往前走。

original: Would you feel better if I checked on your NCR friends for you?
translation: 如果我替你去拜访一下你的NCR朋友们，或许你能感觉好点？

original: Uh... no. No. They're gonna think I'm having trouble letting go. They're good soldiers. I don't give them enough credit.
translation: 呃……不，不。他们会以为我仍然在没事找事。他们都是好士兵。我没有给予他们足够的信任。

original: set VFreeformNovac.nRangerStationCharlieStage to 10\nRSCharlieRangerRef.Disable
You're with the NCR, right?
translation: 你是NCR的人，对吧？

original: Was. Was with them. That was back when my arm and leg used to work better.
translation: 曾经是。为他们卖命过。那时候我的胳膊和腿还能听使唤。

original: I still like to pretend I'm a Ranger, though. I'll check in with the guys up at the station pretty regular on the ham radio.
translation: 其实，我喜欢假装自己仍然是一名游骑兵战士。我经常用业余电台和驻站里面的哥们聊天。

original: Sometimes they stop by, tell me they're paying their respects, the smug bastards.
translation: 有时候他们会来拜访我，还向我表达敬意，这帮混球。

original: They haven't been responding to me, last couple days. I guess they got tired of hearing me talk, but it's still got me a little worried.
translation: 不过最近他们却不再回应我了。也许他们听腻了我的唠叨，但我很担心他们。

original: Hell, listen to me talk. Like some damn mother hen.
translation: 妈的，瞧我这多嘴的样子，就像一只叫唤不停的老母鸡。

original: if VNPCFollowers.RaulHired == 1 && VDialogueRaul.MetRangerAndy == 0\n     set VDialogueRaul.MetRangerAndy to 1\nendif
Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: Boone has returned to Camp McCarran.
translation: 布恩已经返回了麦卡伦营地。

original: Boone has returned to Camp Forlorn Hope.
translation: 布恩已经返回了飘零希望营地。

original: Boone has returned to Novac Watertower Camp.
translation: 布恩已经返回了诺瓦克水塔营地。

original: All right.
translation: 好的。

original: Yeah, that's what I think. You should head back home.
translation: 是，我是这么想的。你应该回家去。

original: All right. Guess I'll be around Novac for a while longer, until I figure out what I want to do with myself. See you around.
translation: 好吧。我估计会回诺瓦克待一段时间，想清楚自己究竟该干什么。再见。
