Yeah, that's what I think. You should head back home.
translation: 是，我是这么想的。你应该回家去。

original: Why did you leave the army?
translation: 你为什么离开军队？

original: I didn't. My C.O. ordered me to flog a couple "deserters," and I told him to eat shit. So they kicked me out for insubordination.
translation: 我没有离开。我的指挥官命令我去鞭打一群"逃兵，"我让他去吃屎。结果他们就以抗命为由把我开除出了军队。

original: Those kids didn't desert. They just got liquored up on the Strip and missed roll call.
translation: 那群小鬼根本就没逃跑。他们不过是在长街喝高了，错过了集合号。

original: I don't know what else the brass expects... half these kids don't get more than two weeks of training before they ship 'em out here.
translation: 我实在不懂那些当官的在想什么……这群小鬼被送过来之前，有一半人只接受过不到两个礼拜的训练。

original: Set VFreeform188.bAskedArmsMercAboutDischarge to 1
What do you know about Legion raids?
translation: 关于军团劫掠队你都知道些什么？

original: Not much. I hear some folks got killed down by Nelson... or was it Novac? I don't know. If they come up this way, me and dad'll go someplace else.
translation: 也不多。我听说纳尔逊有人被杀……又或者是诺瓦克？我不知道。如果他们打过来，我就得和老爸逃到别的地方去。

original: Why'd you settle in this dump?
translation: 你为什么住在这个垃圾堆里？

original: There's more to the 188 than meets the eye. Troops move back and forth on 93 all the time, and 95 is how NCR folks come and go from Vegas.
translation: 来188贸易站的人可比你看见的要多得多。步兵们在93号公路上往来穿梭，95号公路则是NCR往返维加斯的必经之路。

original: No shortage of customers... so long as Legion raids south of here don't get worse, anyways.
translation: 我并不缺客人…只要军团不会继续在南边打家劫舍就行。

original: Well... There's been reports of trouble south, but me and Michelle can handle ourselves. And there's plenty of soldiers about, so that helps.
translation: 哦…南边据说是有点麻烦，不过我和米歇尔能应付得来。这儿有很多士兵，也能帮上忙。

original: Is it safe here?
translation: 这里安全吗？

original: When 15 shut down, 95 became the route NCR citizens use to get to the Strip - or limp back home, after the Strip's drained 'em of caps.
translation: 15号州际公路关闭以后，NCR的人就只能走95号公路去长街——等他们花完了瓶盖，也只能走那条路回家。

original: We get 'em coming and going. Coming, the suckers flush with caps they saved to gamble on the Strip...
translation: 所以无论来回，我们都能和他们打个照面。来的时候，那些傻瓜的兜里都揣着去长街赌博的钱…

original: ...and going, the same folks, but now they're losers who'll trade you the shirt off their backs so they don't starve before they make it back home.
translation: …走的时候，人还是那些人，口袋里却一文不剩，只能变卖点家当，免得回家路上挨饿。

original: Add in the troopers marching back and forth from McCarran and the Dam, and well, let's just say we don't miss Primm.
translation: 再加上士兵们往返麦卡伦和大坝也要路过这里，这么说吧，我们一点都不想念普瑞姆。

original: Why's business so good here?
translation: 这的生意怎么这么好？

original: How did you end up selling weapons?
translation: 你为什么会跑这儿来卖军火？

original: Going home didn't feel right, not with those savages camped on the other side of the river, sharpening their knives.
translation: 河对岸那帮野蛮人依然在磨刀霍霍呢，我就算回了家也不自在。

original: And I still get to see my old platoon when they pass through here... make sure the new C.O. is treating them right, and sneak them extra ammo.
translation: 何况，我的老部队经过这里时，我还能关照一下……看看他们的新指挥官是否称职，顺便再偷塞点弹药给他们。

original: Anyway, I was always complaining about the standard issue gear. The new kids don't even get body armor, can you believe that?
translation: 总之，我以前就常常抱怨我们的装备标准实在太差。新兵们甚至连防弹衣都没有，你能相信吗？

original: Administrative discharge? What does that mean?
translation: 行政处分？什么意思？

original: It means my C.O. was an asshole, and I told him to eat shit. He ordered me to flog a couple "deserters."
translation: 意思是我的上司是个混蛋，我让他去吃屎。他居然命令我去鞭打一群"逃兵。"

original: Those kids didn't desert. They just got liquored up on the Strip and missed roll call.
translation: 那帮小鬼根本就没逃跑。他们不过是在长街喝高了，错过了集合号。

original: I don't know what else the brass expects... half these kids don't get more than two weeks of training before they ship 'em out here.
translation: 我实在不懂那些当官的在想什么……这群小鬼被送过来之前，有一半人只接受过不到两个礼拜的训练。

original: Set VFreeform188.bAskedArmsMercAboutDischarge to 1
NCR doesn't have the caps to outfit their troops?
translation: NCR没钱装备部队？

original: Vegas is bleeding us dry. We're tossing caps at a hundred different problems, while Caesar bides his time and lets us wear ourselves out.
translation: 维加斯快把我们的血给抽干了。各类问题层出不穷，我们前后花了不知多少瓶盖，而凯撒却只是作壁上观，等着我们流尽最后一滴血。

original: This war is gonna bankrupt the NCR, unless we finish off the Legion fast and dirty.
translation: 这场战争已经要让NCR破产了，除非我们能尽快将军团彻底消灭。

original: We shouldn't be perched up at the Dam - we ought to be crossing the Colorado and sticking a boot up Caesar's ass.
translation: 我们不该死盯着那座大坝——我们就该直接跨过大峡谷，一棍子捅爆凯撒的屁股。

original: I'm here to provide support. Is there anything I might be able to help with?
translation: 我是来提供支援的。有什么我能帮忙的？

original: Hmm... you don't cook by any chance, do you? Farber's doing his best, but it's hard to manage an army with half my staff in line for the latrine.
translation: 嗯……你会做饭吗？应该不会吧？法伯已经尽力了，但如果你手下一半的兵都在等着排队上厕所，那你是没办法指挥军队的。

original: Honestly, we're fighting a lot of fires right now. The Fiends keep pressing their position from Vault 3.
translation: 说实话，我们现在四面都有仗要打。那些从3号避难所里出来的恶魔帮一直在骚扰我们。

original: We've got the Legion breathing down our necks across the river. We actually took an officer alive last week, but so far he hasn't spoken a word.
translation: 河对岸还有军团在虎视眈眈。上周我们刚活捉了他们一个军官，但他到现在都没开口说一个字。

original: set VFreeformMcCarran2.bGottenHsuRundown to 1\nset VFreeformMcCarran.iAwfulFood to 1
I'm up for hire if you need some extra manpower around the base.
translation: 如果你需要额外的人手，随时可以雇我。

original: There are a lot of things I can't spare troops for right now. If you can help us, we can definitely pay you for your work.
translation: 现在确实有太多事情我抽不出人手去做。如果你肯帮我们，我们一定会付你报酬的。.

original: How are things going for the NCR around here?
translation: NCR在这地方的进展如何？

original: Could be better, I'll say that much.
translation: 我只能说，不够理想。

original: We set up here with our sights set on annexing New Vegas. That's a lot of resources that could do a lot of good for us. But that hasn't happened.
translation: 我们到这儿来的根本目的是为了吞并新维加斯。这里资源丰富，对我们会有很大用处。可最后的情况却完全相反。

original: If anything, they annexed us. They rake in the profits from our soldiers and we're stuck protecting them from the Legion. Not exactly the plan.
translation: 说他们吞并了我们还差不多。他们把我们的士兵榨得身无分文，我们还得成天为他们抵御军团入侵。和计划完全是两样子。

original: I bet I could make the Legion prisoner talk.
translation: 我也许可以让那个军团俘虏开口。

original: I have Lieutenant Boyd on that already, and she's excellent. But I think she's hit a wall.
translation: 我已经让博伊德中尉负责这件事了。她虽然很优秀，但目前看来她是遇到困难了。

original: Talk to her, if you like. See if she has any use for you.
translation: 你愿意的话就去找她聊两句吧，看她需不需要你帮忙。

original: Her office is right above mine, but I think she might be interrogating right now. So she'd be upstairs on the other side of the building.
translation: 她的办公室就在我这间屋子的正上方。但我觉得她现在可能在审讯犯人，所以她应该会在楼上的另一侧。

original: AddNote VFreeformMcCarran2POWNote
Where do you get your water?
translation: 你从哪弄到水的？

original: The NCR fixed up the pipe network pretty good, and water merchants like me are allowed to have some of it to sell.
translation: NCR修复了供水系统，也允许我这样的送水商人拿一些淡水出来卖。

original: If we have a water license, of course. Still, it beats the inconvenience of having to trek all the way to the lake to resupply.
translation: 当然，得有供水许可证才行。但还是比长途跋涉到湖边取水方便多了。

original: What do you think of NCR's chances against the Legion?
translation: 你认为NCR能打败军团吗？

original: To be frank, I have no idea. I leave the fighting to Colonel Hsu, and I expect him to leave the science to me.
translation: 说实话，我不清楚。打仗的事都是许上校在负责，我只期望他能把科研工作交给我。

original: Too many people have opinions on things they know nothing about. And the more ignorant they are, the more opinions they have.
translation: 太多人只会不懂装懂。而且越无知的人越喜欢高谈阔论。

original: I hear the food around here is pretty bad.
translation: 我听说这里的伙食不好。

original: It's foul, to tell the truth. Most people try to get what they can from the outside... even if it's just a smuggled candy bar, now and then.
translation: 说实话，恶心透了。大多数人都想办法从外面买吃的……有时候连偷偷弄进来的糖果棒都不放过。

original: Contreras is a genius, he can find almost anything you'd want. Takes caps to get him motivated, though. He won't do a thing for free.
translation: 孔特雷拉斯是个天才，想要什么他几乎都能给你搞到手。不过得给他点瓶盖。他可不会免费帮你办事。.

original: The NCR sent me here to take care of you.
translation: NCR派我来料理你。

original: You? Take care of me? Ha! You don't look half-tough enough.
translation: 你？料理我？哈！你看上去一点本事都没有。

original: If the Fiends are so dangerous, why hasn't the NCR wiped them out?
translation: 如果这些恶魔帮真的这么危险，为什么NCR不除掉他们？

original: Current orders are to hold the line and nothing more. That's all we seem to do these days - hold the line.
translation: 我们当前的命令是守住防线。眼下我们做的也基本就是这件事——守住防线。

original: I guess it's a tricky situation since there's a vault in Fiend territory. If the NCR went after them, they'd just hole up.
translation: 情况还是挺棘手的，因为恶魔帮的地盘上刚好有一座避难所。只要NCR一追来，他们就会躲入地下。

original: ShowMap Vault3MapMarkerREF
Are there more dangerous posts?
translation: 有更危险的岗位吗？

original: Oh, you'd better believe it. I feel sorry for the troops who are charged with keeping the Fiends from overrunning everything.
translation: 噢，你别不信。我真为那些每天都在与恶魔帮搏斗的战友们感到遗憾。

original: The Fiends are scary because they're unpredictable. One day, they'll be taking potshots at you and then running off before you can shoot back.
translation: 恶魔帮之所以可怕，是因为他们的行为捉摸不定。他们会突然间冒出来，放几发冷枪，然后趁你还未反应过来就逃之夭夭。

original: And the next day, they'll come rushing at you pumped full of drugs and not stopping until you or they are dead.
translation: 到了第二天，他们就会浑身药味地冲过来与你拼命，直到有一边死透了为止。

original: McCarran's mess hall needs more variety. Could we work out a deal?
translation: 麦卡伦的食堂需要添点菜色，我们能做笔交易吗？ ?

original: Well, business is pretty light and I'd welcome the income, but I'll need a lot of caps to buy the necessary supplies.
translation: 好吧，生意清淡，我也希望能多几桩买卖，但我还是需要瓶盖去购买一些必要的物资。

original: 200 caps would get me started.
translation: 给我200个瓶盖我就干。

original: Know where I can find a doctor?
translation: 知道我到哪能找到医生吗？

original: I'm pretty sure they've got a doc over at Camp McCarran, but I don't know if he'll treat just anybody.
translation: 我敢肯定，麦卡伦营地有一个医生，但不知道他会不会给外人看病。

original: What do you know about the NCR?
translation: 有关NCR你知道些什么？

original: Their main base is right over there by the old airport - it's called Camp McCarran now. Some people like to paint 'em all as a bunch of bullies.
translation: 他们的大本营就建在附近那座旧机场内——现在叫麦卡伦营地。有些人喜欢将他们形容成一伙恃强凌弱的恶霸。

original: Me, I'm glad they're around. They do what they can to keep things safe and orderly.
translation: 我倒是很欢迎他们。他们始终在坚持维持这里的安定和秩序。

original: ShowMap CampMcCarranMapMarker
Tell me about the Fiends.
translation: 和我说说恶魔帮。

original: They're a bunch of crazies hopped up on all kind of drugs. Apparently, they're using one of the old vaults as a hideout.
translation: 他们是一群靠嗑药过活的疯子。他们现在躲在一座老避难所里。

original: The army should really get in there and wipe 'em all out, but I guess they've got more than enough trouble to deal with right now.
translation: 军队真该去把他们铲除掉，不过我想他们现在应该也抽不开身吧。

original: ;ShowMap Vault3MapMarker
Got any more open bounties?
translation: 还有公开悬赏么？

original: Damn right I do. Who do you think you can take down?
translation: 当然有了。你想要干掉谁？

original: You're having trouble with the Fiends?
translation: 你们和恶魔帮有过节？

original: Damn right I am. And I'm paying bounties.
translation: 说对了。而且我正在悬赏他们的首级。

original: What do you know about the Fiends?
translation: 关于恶魔帮你知道多少？

original: Pack of drugged-out killers. They're addicted to every stim, every pill, every psychoactive enema on this fucked-up earth.
translation: 一群嗑了药的杀人狂。他们喜欢这蛮荒星球上的所有刺激，任何药物，任何毒品，任何神经刺激物，都能令他们格外兴奋。.

original: I've got three Fiends I want dead, and I don't give a goddamn how it gets done. That sound like something that interests you?
translation: 我这儿有三个恶魔帮的人，我想除掉他们。我不管用什么手段，只要他们死了就行。你感兴趣吗？

original: set VFreeformMcCarran3.bMentionedBounties to 1\nSetStage VMS12 5
McCarran is looking for a regular delivery of meat from local merchants.
translation: 麦卡伦正在物色一名能定期派送肉类的本地商人。

original: Really? Well, I obviously couldn't supply enough to feed the entire camp, but I'm game. What kind of caps are we talking here?
translation: 真的？嗯，很明显我这儿的物资不足以喂饱整个营地，但我看好这桩买卖。打算用什么方式付款？ ?

original: What do you do around here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: Kickin' ass. Mostly kickin' ass. See, we're watching the perimeter right now. Looking for those F-f-fiends to come back.
translation: 消灭敌人啊，多数时候都在消灭敌人。你看，我们现在监视着整片区域。等着那些恶、恶、恶魔帮杀回来。

original: When they show their faces, that's when we go to work. One shot, one k-k-kill. That's the First Recon way.
translation: 一旦他们出现在我的瞄准镜里，我们就有活干了。一枪一个、个准。我们第一侦察营就是干这事的。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 什么意思？

original: Legion fights to win. And they're smart... hell of a lot smarter than these crazy Fiends. But I don't feel bad about shooting Legion boys.
translation: 军团一心求胜。他们很狡猾……比这些没脑子的恶魔帮厉害多了。可朝军团士兵开枪，我绝不会心慈手软。

original: Fiends, on the other hand... sometimes I get some pangs of conscience. Not often. But sometimes.
translation: 对恶魔帮却不同……有时候我反而会感到良心受了谴责。不常有，但确实会。

original: Have you seen any serious combat here?
translation: 最近有没有什么比较激烈的战斗？

original: Not unless you count the Fiends as serious. Gorobets keeps us inside the fence, most of the time. Doesn't matter to me, I just shoot bad guys.
translation: 没有，除非你觉得剿灭恶魔帮也能算“激烈”。大部分时间格罗别茨只把我们关在军营里。我无所谓，反正我只负责杀敌。

original: Sooner or later, they'll move us out to the Dam, though. That's when the shit gets nasty.
translation: 早晚他们会把我们调到大坝去的。不过那时候事情可就真的麻烦了。

original: I'd like to hear about your open bounties.
translation: 我想知道你们公开悬赏的人是谁。

original: Good. That's damn good. I figure it's about time we got lucky out here, so maybe you can snuff one of these maniacs.
translation: 很好，非常好。我估计咱们也该时来运转了，说不定你真有能力制服那几个变态呢。

original: So what do you do now that the fighting's died down?
translation: 那么，没有战斗的时候你都在做些什么？

original: Mostly drill the troops, try to keep the discipline up and combat readiness high.
translation: 多数时候在训练士兵，维持纪律，确保部队的战斗力。

original: It's not the easiest job in the world - soldiers without a mission get bored very easily.
translation: 这不是一份简单的差事，没有接到任务指派的士兵很容易就会变得无所事事。

original: Still, with the Legion just across the river, we have to be ready.
translation: 而军团却一直在河对岸虎视眈眈，我们必须时刻做好准备。

original: What do you think of Camp Golf?
translation: 你觉得高尔夫营地怎么样？

original: Oh, it's a fine place. The lake is real {purty}pretty, and we don't get bothered much by them Legion fellers.
translation: 噢，地方不错。这里的湖水真是{purty}漂亮，而且我们不太会受到军团的骚扰。

original: NCR?
translation: NCR？

original: The New California Republic. Bunch of settlers and soldiers coming in from the West, fixing on making Nevada their own.
translation: 新加州共和国。一群从西边来的定居者和士兵，致力于把内华达据为己有。

original: They can be right pushy, but the roads are safer 'cause of them, so I tend to let it go.
translation: 他们的态度虽然有些咄咄逼人，但道路确实也因为他们而变得安全了，所以我一般不怎么去管他们。

original: Not that I got a choice.
translation: 当然，我也没别的选择。

original: What do you need help with?
translation: 你需要我帮什么？

original: I have the delightful task of tabulating stockpiles, kill ratios, mission success rates, radiation deaths, and other truly fascinating numbers.
translation: 我的工作，简单来说就是统计物资储备、杀伤率、任务成功率、辐射死亡率及其他各类数字，将它们整理成表格。

original: I've come across numerous inconsistencies between our numbers and our reports - especially with regards to intercepting hostiles.
translation: 但近来我发现有不少报告与实际数字之间存在出入，尤其是拦截敌人数量这一块。

original: I'm wondering if our radio security codes have been compromised. I need someone to deliver security code upgrades to each of the Ranger stations.
translation: 我怀疑我们的电台安全代码已经泄露。我需要一个人将安全代码的升级程序上传到每个游骑兵驻站。

original: I'm not a trooper. I just happen to be wearing the armor.
translation: 我不是士兵，我只是恰好穿着这套行头罢了。

original: Oh. Well, you'd better not let any of the real troopers hear that - and, of course, they won't be hearing it from me, neither.
translation: 哦。好吧，那你可最好别被那些当兵的逮到啊。当然，我是不会去向他们告状的。

original: So, what brings you to Boulder City? Not many people come here.
translation: 话说回来，你为什么要来巨石城？来这儿的人并不多。

original: Anything going on around here?
translation: 最近有什么新变化吗？

original: Just the usual. Legion scouts try to slip across the river a couple of times a week, but they always end up floating downriver with holes in their heads.
translation: 老样子，军团的斥候每星期都想溜过河。不过他们最后的结局都是脑门上多了几个窟窿，顺着河飘走了。

original: I think you should know something about Benny.
translation: 我觉得应该让你知道一下本尼的真面目。

original: Really? You got something to say about the big boss, huh? Well, why don't you say it to his face instead of yapping at me?
translation: 真的吗？你对大老板有什么看法？好吧，为什么你不去当着他的面说，反而跑到我这儿来嚼舌头？

original: What do you do here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: I operate the radio and call it in if we see any Great Khans moving out in large groups from Red Rock Canyon.
translation: 如果红岩峡谷的大汗帮有大规模的迁徙动作，我会立刻无线电向上汇报。

original: ShowMap RedRockCanyonMarker
What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: Ranger military outpost. We're keeping an eye on the Legion activities south of here at Cottonwood Cove.
translation: 我们是游骑兵军事哨站。主要负责监视南边棉白杨湾的军团动向。

original: Nothing going on down there at the moment - just the usual slave trafficking. Poor bastards.
translation: 目前那里一切正常——就是时常会有贩卖奴隶的情况发生。哎，这些可怜虫。

original: ShowMap CottonwoodCoveMapMarker\nset vDialogueRangerStationEcho.bCottonwoodCoveMentioned to 1
If I wanted to calm things down in Freeside, where would I start?
translation: 如果我想缓和一下自由城的紧张局势，该从哪里入手？

original: The big man around here is The King. Not much happens in Freeside that he doesn't know about.
translation: 猫王是这里的老大。自由城里发生的大小事情，没有什么是他不知道的。

original: He has the most influence locally, and some of his crew haven't helped the situation by harassing NCR citizens and charging double for water.
translation: 他是当地最有影响力的人物，可他的一些手下却在帮倒忙，他们骚扰NCR居民，还以双倍价格倒卖淡水。

original: Some NCR soldiers have been bringing in supplies, but none of it is going to Freeside locals. I've tried to speak to both sides to no avail.
translation: 有些NCR士兵运了物资进来，却不肯发放给自由城当地的百姓。我曾试图跟双方交涉，但毫无用处。

original: I might be able to work something out.
translation: 我觉得咱们可以谈一下条件。

original: Good. We can supply them with all the Med-X they need. For the Fixer, we'll only be able to send over some basic drug components.
translation: 很好。我们可以提供他们所需要的吗啡针-X。至于瘾头解，我们只能提供一部分基本原料。

original: We're not in the business of getting people off drugs, so we don't really dabble in that side of things.
translation: 我们从来没有帮人戒过毒，所以对这一块不怎么了解。

original: The Followers should be able to whip some up with what we have available, though.
translation: 天启追随者倒是有能力用我们提供的东西做出戒毒药。

original: They just need to agree to fix up our stills and keep them maintained plus cover the cost for raw materials needed to make the alcohol.
translation: 他们只要同意帮我们维修蒸馏器，并做好保养工作，同时承担酿酒所需的一切原料开支。

original: set VFreeformFreeside.FollowersSupplies to 2
The Followers need to find someone to trade with for supplies.
translation: 天启追随者想找一个物资供应商。

original: Really now? This is news. We could possibly supply what they need, but they would need to supply us in kind.
translation: 真的？这倒挺新鲜的。我们可以给他们供货，不过他们也得给我们一点回报。

original: They have the tech know-how to make our stills work more efficiently. Purer alcohol means we can get our customers drunk quicker.
translation: 他们的技术可以提高蒸馏器的效率。酒精纯度越高，我们的客人就能醉得越快。

original: Getting our customers drunk quicker means more caps spent at the tables and stuffing slots if you know what I mean.
translation: 客人们醉得越快，花在牌桌和老虎机上的时间也就越多，你明白我的意思吧。

original: Plus, the extra alcohol can serve as surgical disinfectant for their needs. The Followers are a good lot. They've stitched up our boys in the past.
translation: 而且，多余的酒精也能提供给他们做术前消毒。天启追随者人都不错，他们为我们这儿的百姓做过不少手术。

original: How's business?
translation: 生意如何？

original: Well, I wasn't expecting the increased NCR presence after the bombing to improve things, but I've been pleasantly surprised.
translation: 好吧，我从没想到爆炸事故后NCR顾客的数量会增长得如此迅猛，但结果还是挺让我惊喜的。

original: The off-duty chumps who have been wandering through have been stopping in to buy drinks and pay for strange. I appreciate the extra income.
translation: 那些蠢货不当班的时候，就会四处闲逛，来我这儿买醉，倒是给我贡献了不少额外的收入。

original: I spoke with Julie Farkas. She says the Followers will accept your offer.
translation: 我和朱莉·法卡斯谈过了。她说天启追随者接受你的提议。

original: Hey, that's great. We'll get some supplies sent over today as a show of good faith.
translation: 嘿，那太好了。我们今天就送货过去，以表示我们的诚意。

original: Once our stills are upgraded, we'll never be short on liquor for our patrons. If Jacob Hoff is sober, we might even have a few new drinks on tap.
translation: 一旦我们的蒸馏器升级完毕，我们的客人就再也不会缺酒喝了。要是雅各布·霍夫还清醒的话，或许我们还能推出些新品种。

original: Most might view us as drug dealing enablers around here, but honestly we care about our patrons. It's bad business for people to get addicted.
translation: 大家总把我们这儿当作毒品的集散地，但我们其实一直在为客人着想。引诱人吸毒对生意又没好处。

original: We've got enough crime in Freeside without a bunch of strung-out junkies robbing traders and gamblers to afford their next fix.
translation: 自由城的治安情况已经够糟了，那些瘾君子为了凑齐毒资，不惜四处打劫商人和赌客，简直是雪上加霜。

original:
set VFreeformFreeside.FollowersSupplies to 4
player.addreputation RepNVFreeside 1 3

;//== Add Jacob Hoff's items to the leveled list
AdditemToLeveledList VFSVendorAWLiquor VFSVendorAWLiquorJacob 1 3 100
What's the concrete used for?
translation: 水泥是做什么用的？

original: The NCR has been constructing bunkers up and down the river. From what I've heard, it's a little late for that.
translation: NCR一直在沿河岸修建碉堡。不过据我所知，现在才亡羊补牢已经有些迟了。

original: Travelers over at the 188 - just up the road - said that the Legion has overrun a couple of towns to the south.
translation: 从公路那头的188号贸易站过来的旅行者说，军团已经控制了南边的好些镇子。

original: What do you do here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: The Legion's got a major crossing point down at Cottonwood Cove, so we keep an eye on them from up here.
translation: 军团在棉白杨湾把控着一个重要的战略据点，所以我们得时刻监视他们的动向。

original: If McCarran would send us some more men, we could do more than watch.
translation: 如果麦卡伦能多派点人过来，我们也就不用干瞪眼了。

original: ShowMap CottonwoodCoveMapMarker\nset vDialogueRangerStationEcho.bKnowErasmusUpset to 1
What are you doing out here?
translation: 你在这里做什么？

original: Keeping watch on the Great Khans mostly. They usually stick around Red Rock Canyon, but at least one large group left recently.
translation: 主要是监视大汗帮。他们通常在红岩峡谷一带活动，但最近已经有大批人员动身离开。

original: We called it in, but haven't heard anything about any Great Khan incidents. Whatever they're doing, they're keeping a low profile.
translation: 我们已经向上级作了汇报i，不过还没发现大汗帮有什么动作。他们一直非常低调。

original: ShowMap RedRockCanyonMarker
What do you want me to do now?
translation: 你现在希望我做些什么？

original: Well, with that over with and the Legion forces at Nelson defeated, we finally have some breathing room.
translation: 嗯，事情完结了，纳尔逊的军团部队也被打败了，我们现在终于有了个喘息的机会了。

original: Now we can actually try to strengthen our forces along the river and prepare for the upcoming battle at Hoover Dam.
translation: 现在我们终于可以沿着河流加强我们的军事力量，并为即将到来的胡佛水坝之战做准备了。

original: setStage VMS30 160
With the help you've given us, we're doing a little bit better, but we still have the Legion forces at Nelson to deal with.
translation: 在你的帮助下，局面有所好转，但军团在纳尔逊的军事存在仍然是个问题。

original: If we can retake Nelson, that will be a huge help to our efforts in this area and give us an advantage at Hoover Dam.
translation: 如果可以夺回纳尔逊，那将对我们在该地区的形势带来巨大的帮助，并能使我们在胡佛水坝之战中占得优势。

original: Why charge for water?
translation: 为什么水也要收钱？

original: If we let everyone run amok, the damn NCR would shut us down. Gotta have some way to regulate usage.
translation: 如果让大家随意取用的话，NCR就会关掉水泵。总得想办法立个规矩。

original: How're things around the camp?
translation: 营地的情况如何？

original: Better now that all those Legion troops in Nelson are dead. The NCR might actually have a chance of kicking their asses after all.
translation: 现在好多了，纳尔逊那边的军团部队都完蛋了。NCR终于有机会可以狠狠教训他们一顿了。

original: It just so happens a position opened up recently. We currently need another body to guard the entrance outside. Think you can handle that?
translation: 最近正巧有个职缺。虽然报酬不高，但我可以利用这个机会好好考察一下你的潜力，以决定将来是否继续聘任你。

original: I was wondering if you had any work available.
translation: 我想知道你这里有没有什么工作。

original: Ran out of caps, eh? The job's still available, if you're interested.
translation: 缺钱了？如果你有兴趣的话，那个职位依旧给你留着。

original: Is that guard position still available?
translation: 保安职位还有空缺吗？

original: What's your problem?
translation: 你有什么问题？

original: My problem? My problem is we're all going to die.
translation: 我有什么问题？我的问题就是我们都要死了。

original: The Legion may be gone from Nelson, but there's still a whole fucking army of them out there.
translation: 就算纳尔逊的军团被消灭了，他们仍然有一整支该死的军队在外面游荡。

original: Today... tomorrow... it doesn't matter, we're all going to die in this war.
translation: 今天……明天……根本无所谓，反正我们最后都会在这场战争中死掉。

original: So why don't you just leave me alone.
translation: 所以你最好别来烦我了。

original: My problem? My problem is we're all going to die.
translation: 我有什么问题？我的问题就是我们都要死啦。

original: We're out of food, we're out of men, and we're out of time. The Legion is right outside waiting to kill us all.
translation: 我们没有食物，我们没有人手，而且我们也没有时间。军团就守在外面，等着把我们全部杀死。

original: Today... tomorrow... it doesn't matter, we're all going to die here.
translation: 今天……明天……根本无所谓，反正我们最后都会在这场战争中死掉。

original: So why don't you just leave me alone.
translation: 所以你最好别来烦我了。

original: How are things around camp?
translation: 营地的情况如何？

original: You kidding me, man? How are things? They're all fucked up, that's how things are!
translation: 你在开我玩笑呢，伙计？情况如何？全都他妈糟透了，情况就是这样！

original: Everyone is either starving or dying out here. Left out to dry by the rest of the NCR. Fuck this place.
translation: 大家不是忍饥挨饿就是在外战死。我们被NCR扔在这里自生自灭。这操蛋的地方。

original: I'd rather be anywhere else but here.
translation: 如果有地方可去，我才不想呆在这儿呢。

original: Tell me about the Strip.
translation: 跟我说说长街。

original: It's the most amazing place in the world, don't you think? This must be what it was like to live a thousand years ago!
translation: 你不觉得这是世界上最奇妙的地方吗？千年前的人们一定就是这么生活的！

original: There are three casinos open for business - Gomorrah, The Tops, and the Ultra-Luxe. They get nicer in that order.
translation: 这里有三家赌场：蛾摩拉，九重天，和奢华殿堂。一家比一家好。

original: This here's the monorail station leading in from Camp McCarran. Most of my business is with soldiers coming and going on furlough.
translation: 还有一条从麦卡伦营地引过来的单轨铁路。我的大多数主顾都是来休假的士兵。

original: Set VFreeformTheStreet02.Vendor01TalksStreet to 1
What do you sell?
translation: 你都卖些什么？

original: Non-alcoholic beverages and snack foods. The casinos get to sell booze. No one else does.
translation: 无酒精饮料和零食。酒品生意都被赌场抢了。

original: Set VFreeformTheStreet02.Vendor01TalksWares to 1
What's your take on the NCR's position here?
translation: 你对这边NCR的情况怎么看？

original: It's no picnic, I'll tell you that much. My troops are out here every day dying for the NCR, but they've left us out to dry.
translation: 我只能告诉你，事情不轻松。我的士兵每天在外面为NCR流血卖命，而他们却让我们在这自生自灭。

original: We have no men or supplies and we're stretched too thin trying to guard the entire river.
translation: 我们没有足够的士兵和补给品，我们的战线也拉得太长，导致河岸的布防严重不足。

original: If the brass back home could get their heads out of their asses long enough to send support, we could turn this all around.
translation: 如果老家那些当官的能拿出点魄力，给我们多派些补给，我们很可能已经扭转局势了。

original: How do things look around the camp?
translation: 营地的情况如何？

original: Not good. We still haven't gotten any support from the rest of the NCR and the Legion is kicking our ass right now.
translation: 不好。我们仍然没有从友军那里得到任何补给，而军团现在正牢牢占据着上风。

original: What is your assignment?
translation: 你的任务是什么？

original: I've been placed in charge of morale. It's difficult trying to keep spirits up with the Legion nearby.
translation: 我主要负责维持士气。军团就在附近虎视眈眈，想要保持斗志昂扬真的很难。

original: In fact, there's more hope in wrangling Brahmin with my grandmother's stocking than inspiring these troopers.
translation: 我说句实在话，哪怕用我奶奶的臭袜子去套牛，都比给这帮家伙打气要来得靠谱。

original: About that competition.
translation: 关于比赛……

original: Haven't started it yet. Are you interested to hear about it now?
translation: 还没开始呢。你现在有兴趣听吗？

original: You ready to participate?
translation: 你准备好参加了吗？

original: Here are some ears.
translation: 我有一些耳朵。

original: Woah boy! This puts you far ahead of everyone else. I think I'll have to declare you the winner of the competition.
translation: 哇，天哪！这个数目可是遥遥领先于其他人啊。看来我只能宣布这场比赛是你赢了。

original: It's not much, but here's a little something I scraped together for the winner of the contest. Good job, you earned it.
translation: 我为优胜者准备了一些小奖品，虽然不多，也希望你喜欢。干得好，这是你应得的。

original:
Set vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarTotal to vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarTotal + vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1
;Player.AddItem Caps001 vFreeformForlornHope03.CashMoney
Player.RemoveItem LegionEar vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1
vFreeformForlornHope03TrigREF.EnterTrigger Player

Set vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1 to 0
Set vFreeformForlornHope03.CashMoney to 0

setStage vFreeformForlornHope03 100
Oh man! Awesome! The competition is still going strong. Keep it up!
translation: 噢，伙计！了不起！比赛还在继续。加油吧！

original:
Set vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarTotal to vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEarTotal + vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1
;Player.AddItem Caps001 vFreeformForlornHope03.CashMoney
Player.RemoveItem LegionEar vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1
vFreeformForlornHope03TrigREF.EnterTrigger Player
Set vFreeformForlornHope03.LegionEar1 to 0\nSet vFreeformForlornHope03.CashMoney to 0
How's the morale doing?
translation: 现在士气如何？

original: The best it's been since the camp started. All because of you. So thanks, buddy!
translation: 自从建立营地以来，就没这么旺盛过。这可多亏了你呀。多谢了，伙计！

original: I've slaughtered the enemy at Camp Forlorn Hope.
translation: 我宰掉了飘零希望营地里的所有敌人。

original: A glorious victory. You must be very {gritting your teeth}satisfied.
translation: 一场伟大的胜利。你肯定心满意足了吧。{gritting your teeth}

original: I'll send word of your achievement. Perhaps {kai-zar}Caesar will see fit to send another contubernium to occupy the Camp.
translation: 我会向人转告你胜利的消息。或许{kai-zar}凯撒会适时派出一支同帐小队去接管那座营地。

original: Here - take this, my blade. It was a gift from my Centurion upon the defeat of the Sun Dog tribe.
translation: 给，拿着吧，这是我的宝刃。是我打败太阳犬部落后，我的百夫长赠予我的礼物。

original: SetObjectiveCompleted VDeadSea 20 1
setstage vdeadsea 100\nplayer.additem weapNVMacheteDeadSea 1\nLegionaryDeadSeaREF.removeitem weapNVMacheteDeadSea 1
What do you think of the NCR?
translation: 你怎么看NCR？

original: I reckon they care about getting water and electricity from the dam, and that's where it ends.
translation: 我觉得他们很重视从大坝获得的水和电，但也仅此而已。

original: The locals here are just an inconvenience to 'em, something to step over or stomp down. They're here for the resources, plain and simple.
translation: 本地人对他们来说不过是块绊脚石，可以任意践踏和压榨。他们的目的很明确，就是来要资源的。

original: Do you think about Bitter Springs a lot?
translation: 你会经常想起苦泉吗？

original: Yeah. Always. Even when I sleep.
translation: 没错。经常。连睡觉的时候都想。

original: Hector told me everything.
translation: 赫克托把一切都告诉我了。

original: I suppose there's no point in denying it any longer. I killed Corporal White to protect Westside's self-reliance. It was rash, and I regret it now.
translation: 看来我也没必要继续否认了。为了保护西区的独立，我杀掉了怀特中士。这么做太过鲁莽，我现在后悔了。

original: We don't have money to pay for the water, so I rigged the pump station to divert water to the local cisterns from time to time.
translation: 我们没有钱来支付水费，所以我时常会用些不正当的手段将泵站里的水引到本地的蓄水池里。

original:
SetObjectiveCompleted VMS11 70 1
set VMS11.bAndersonConfessed to 1

; JSH 11.03.10 - Close obsolete objectives
if (GetObjectiveDisplayed VMS11 5 == 1) && (GetObjectiveCompleted VMS11 5 == 0)
    SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS11 5 0
endif
I heard Corporal White came here to investigate a water shortage.
translation: 我听说怀特下士来这里调查过缺水的事。

original: No one by that name has come here, I'm afraid. You must've heard wrong. You can ask around if you'd like - they'll all tell you the same thing.
translation: 恐怕没有叫这个名字的人来过。你肯定是听错了。不信你可以问问其他人——他们也没见过。

original: SetStage VMS11 50
Do you have a problem with the NCR?
translation: 你们和NCR有冲突吗？

original: I don't go looking for fights with them, but they don't have the best interests of people in mind. Certainly not locals.
translation: 我不会主动招惹他们，但他们并不关心人民的利益。尤其不把本地人放在眼里。

original: The bottom line for NCR is productivity and growth. Politicians back in Shady Sands are completely detached from the people actually living here.
translation: NCR的眼里只有生产力和经济增长。沙荫镇的政客与居住在这里的人民完全是脱节的。

original: By "captures," do you mean "slaves"?
translation: "猎物"，你指的是"奴隶"？

original: {good-humored}No, no, no - they haven't yet earned the right to be called "slaves"! Those three in the pen are captures, nothing more.
translation: {good-humored}不，不，不——它们还没有资格被叫做"奴隶"！围栏里的那三个只是猎物，仅此而已。

original: {as though talking about animal training}I'm a Slavemaster, so I know what I'm talking about. Back at the Fort, I'd have those three half-broken and well on their way.
translation: {as though talking about animal training}我是个奴隶主，我知道什么叫奴隶。要是在城堡里，我一定会好好调教他们，让他们听话。

original: But this is just a holding area, so all I do is assess their fitness and decide whether to send them on.
translation: 但这儿只能算是一个收容区，我要评估他们的健康状况，再决定是否要把他们送回去。

original: set VCCCanyonRunnerREF.iDialogue to 1\nset vfreeformcottonwoodcove.capturesmentioned to 2
Do you have a lot of run-ins with the Fiends?
translation: 你们经常遭遇恶魔帮吗？

original: Not so much lately. The NCR is giving them hell any time they poke their damned heads out. Bless those boys and gals for getting rid of that vermin.
translation: 最近少了。他们只要一露头，就会被NCR打得落花流水。老天保佑那些年轻人，希望他们能铲除那群害虫。

original: I feel pity for any man or woman that gets addicted to chems, but when they prey on decent folk... well, then it's time to put 'em down.
translation: 虽然我对任何被毒品坑害的人都感到同情，但如果他们因此去欺负好人……那就只能送他们归西了。

original: The Dam?
translation: 水坝？

original: The big one. The one the NCR is trying to hold onto, that the Legion's pushing for. Whole war depends on holding it.
translation: 大的那个。NCR想保住它，军团则想把它一举拿下。整场战争的胜负就取决于能不能守得住它了。

original: How's business?
translation: 生意如何？

original: I do decent enough. The NCR patrols usually stop by for a quick bite, and travelers like yourself pass by a couple times a week.
translation: 生意不错。NCR的巡逻队经常过来开小灶，像你这样的旅行者一周都会来好几个。

original: Do you get a lot of customers?
translation: 你的生意怎么样？

original: The caravans or NCR patrols usually don't stop, but we usually get people like yourself wandering on by a few times a week.
translation: 商队和NCR巡逻队通常都不会光顾，但像你这样的流浪者，我们倒是一周能遇到好几个。

original: Does the Legion see much action here?
translation: 这儿的军团作战经验丰富嘛？

original: As much as the Profligates' cowardice will allow. They haven't found the balls to attack us here, but we catch them out on patrols.
translation: 那得看那些软弱无能的败类给不给我们机会了。他们还没有胆量朝这里进攻，但我们却时常能逮到他们的巡逻队。

original: {proud}With two {LATIN}{con-too-BURR-nee-ah}contubernia at my command, I've killed and captured four times my numbers.
translation: {proud}我手下有{LATIN}{con-too-BURR-nee-ah}两支同帐小队，已经歼灭或俘虏了四倍于我们数量的敌人。

original: An NCR officer asked me to plant this listening device here. <Give Aurelius the NCR bug>
translation: 有个NCR军官让我在这儿安装窃听器。<把NCR窃听器给奥勒留>

original: {contempt}The things the Profligates will build, to spy on us like cowards with little machines!
translation: {contempt}荒淫之人就喜欢捣鼓这些小玩意，还想用它来刺探我们，真是群懦夫！

original: Find that officer and give him this old map of our patrol routes. The Profligates will try to set up ambushes... and we'll be waiting for them.
translation: 回去见那个军官，把这张旧的巡逻路线图给他。荒淫之人想要埋伏我们……我们会好好恭迎他们的。

original:
player.removeitem NVCCNCRBug 1
player.additem nvcclegionplansold 1
player.additem nvcclegionnotesold 1
addnote NVCCLegionPapersNote
setobjectivecompleted vcceyeforaneye 45 1
setobjectivedisplayed vcceyeforaneye 50 1
setobjectivedisplayed vcceyeforaneye 10 0
setobjectivedisplayed vcceyeforaneye 20 0
setobjectivedisplayed vcceyeforaneye 30 0
"1343E7".RemoveItem NVCCLegionPlans 1
"1372FF".RemoveItem NVCCLegionNotes 1
Player.RemoveItem NVCCLegionPlans 1 1
Player.RemoveItem NVCCLegionNotes 1 1
addreputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 1 3
I'll give you 150 caps for the lot.
translation: 给你150个瓶盖，这些人我全要了。

original: Seems I'm fortunate to get that much for them, given the circumstances!
translation: 看来我是交到好运了，他们都这种情况了，还能卖出那么高的价钱！

original: Here, this is the key to their collars. You'll want to take those off before you go far, trust me.
translation: 这是他们项圈的钥匙。我建议你在离开前最好先把它们取下来，相信我。

original:
player.removeitem caps001 150
player.additem vccweathersslavekey 1
set vCCLeftMyHeart.iBuySlaves to 3
setObjectiveCompleted vCCLeftMyHeart 10 1
vCCSlavePenGateREF.setOwnership
{scoffing}This isn't the total we agreed upon. Don't waste my time, wastelander.
translation: {scoffing}这和我们说好的不一样。别浪费我的时间，废土游民。

original: How much would it cost to buy the three "captures"?
translation: 买下这三个"猎物"需要花多少钱？

original: It's a weak bunch, to be honest. I'd rather have extra currency to buy supplies or better captures off traders.
translation: 说实话，这些人没什么用处。我宁可多加点钱去换取补给品或更好的猎物。

original: There's a boy, too old to be trained as a Legionary. Normally they would have to die, but he's too frail to make trouble.
translation: 男的年龄太大，已经无法再培养成军团战士了。通常这样的人都得死，但他太弱了，根本惹不出麻烦。

original: The old woman's dried up, but she could keep house or do gardening - if she can learn to keep her mouth shut.
translation: 那个老女人年老色衰，不过她倒是能收拾屋子，或者种花，只要她能学会管住自己的嘴巴。

original: The girl's the only one of real value, young enough to breed, not hideous to look at. What's your offer for the lot?
translation: 唯独那个女孩有点价值，够年轻，能生，看起来也不算太丑。你打算出价多少？

original: set vCCLeftMyHeart.iBuySlaves to 1
I'll do what I can to save them.
translation: 我会尽力救他们。

original: {surly}Don't act like you'd be doing me a favor. I don't give a fuck.
translation: 别说得像是在帮我一样，这他妈关我屁事。

original: setstage vnipton 25
You said some of the people were enslaved?
translation: 你说有些人去当奴隶了？

original: {surly}Yeah, a bunch of those Legion fucks dragged them off right away. They were headed East, if you're feeling heroic.
translation: 是的，一群军团狗日的把他们拖走了。如果你想逞英雄，我告诉你，他们朝东边去了。

original: How do you feel about the NCR?
translation: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

original: Coming east was about securing the land, so people could live without fear.
translation: 东征是为了守卫领土，好让人民不会生活在恐惧中。

original: It's not always that simple. But I think the cause is still right.
translation: 虽然事情并没有这么简单。但我觉得，至少本意是对的。

original: And God help us if they lose.
translation: 如果他们输了，那就只能求上帝保佑了。

original: I'd like to help. What do you need me to do?
translation: 我愿意帮忙。需要我做什么？

original: I'm not convinced that the Nightstalker mutation is a natural one, and I need someone to investigate their lair for proof.
translation: 我不太相信夜行兽的变异是先天的，需要有人去他们的巢穴里调查一番。

original: Some of the Super Mutants have looked around as well, but they've come back empty-handed. Perhaps a pair of fresh eyes will have better luck.
translation: 虽然之前派了超级变种人在周围找过，但他们全都空手而归。也许换个人能有点好运气。

original: Lily might be interested in coming with you - she's lost a few of her Bighorners to Nightstalker attacks and would enjoy a little revenge.
translation: 莉莉也许会愿意和你一块儿去——她有几只大角羊在夜行兽的攻击中丧命了，她正想报仇呢。

original: SetStage VMS41 10
Why are you helping the Nightkin?
translation: 你为什么要帮助夜行族？

original: Because Marcus asked me to and because it's a reason for me to get up in the morning. I'd like to get one more grand accomplishment done.
translation: 因为马可世让我这么做的，也只有这样我早上才能有动力起床。我想再取得一个伟大的成就。

original: Does anyone other than Super Mutants come up this way?
translation: 除了超级变种人，还会有其他人来到这里吗？

original: Prospectors looking for salvage, usually. {amused}They always run when they see the mutants.
translation: 拾荒者经常会到这儿来找宝贝。不过他们总是一看见我们就溜得没影儿了。

original: The Great Khans come this way once in a while, but they keep their distance. I think they're mostly keeping an eye on us.
translation: 大汗帮的队伍偶尔也会出现，但他们始终都与我们保持着距离。我想他们应该是在监视我们。.

original: Tell me about this area of New Vegas.
translation: 告诉我有关新维加斯的情况。

original: Folks call this East Vegas, but I don't care much for names.
translation: 人们把这里叫做东维加斯，但我对名字并不怎么在意。

original: The east side gets a lot of merchant and gambler traffic. We're safer here than in North Vegas or Westside, though we've got to put up with the NCR.
translation: 东区的商业和赌博业较为发达。我们这里比北维加斯和西区都要安全，不过得忍受NCR的统治。

original: Set VdialogueVegasNorth.BeckyTalksVegas to 1
The east side gets lots of merchant and gambler traffic. We're safer here than in North Vegas or Westside, though we've got to put up with the NCR.
translation: 东区的商业和赌博业较为发达。我们这里比北维加斯和西区都要安全，不过得忍受NCR的统治。

original: Tell me again about East Vegas.
translation: 告诉我有关新维加斯的情况。

original: There are some fire geckos in the lower levels of the Vault. We need to get them gone so we can get to the sulfur.
translation: 避难所下层有些火蜥蜴。把它们消灭掉，我们才能进入硫磺洞。

original: You go clear them out for us, and there'll be some caps for you.
translation: 只要你能帮我把它们清理掉，我可以留一些瓶盖给你。

original: I want you to head to Red Rock Canyon, north of here. Find Papa Khan and ask him if he'd allow the Powder Gangers to join up.
translation: 我要你前往红岩峡谷，就在这里的北边。找到父汗，问他是否会允许炸药帮加入。

original: What are NCR troopers doing here?
translation: NCR的士兵在这里干什么？

original: They're part of the deal, the Thaler Act. We work the fields while they protect the crops and the water.
translation: 他们是受塞勒法案调遣来的。我们负责耕地，他们负责保护庄稼和水源。

original: Lotta folks come to New Vegas and lose everything in Freeside or the Strip. They get hungry, desperate, and try to take our hard work.
translation: 来新维加斯的人会有不少在自由城或长街输得倾家荡产。饥饿和绝望会迫使他们前来偷取我们辛苦种下的庄稼。

original: Much as I sympathize, their theft would put me in a bad spot. I got a crop quota to meet.
translation: 虽然我很同情他们，可偷粮食毕竟对我没好处。我还有上缴的指标要完成。

original: The rangers at Echo have been keeping an eye on that place. It's relatively new, but those bastards have already dug in.
translation: 艾柯驻站的游骑兵已经在监视那地方了。那些混蛋才到这地方没多久，但已经站稳脚跟了。

original: They appear to be running a slave-trading operation and it also seems to be one of the primary crossing points for Legion raiding parties.
translation: 他们似乎正在进行奴隶买卖，看上去也是他们和军团劫掠队主要的交集所在。

original: set vcceyeforaneye.iastorasked to 1
Let's hear it.
translation: 不妨说来听听。

original: What do you know about the Followers of the Apocalypse?
translation: 关于天启追随者，你知道些什么？

original: They're based out of the old fort in Freeside. They supposedly helped the NCR out at some point, but they go their own way now.
translation: 他们的基地设在自由城的摩门要塞。据说他们原来曾帮助过NCR，但现在已经分道扬镳了。

original: They know stuff about tech and medicine and usually help out anybody who asks. Can't say I know any more than that.
translation: 他们懂得科学和医疗技术，对需要帮助的人会毫不犹豫地伸出援手。至于其他的，我也知道的不多。

original: What can you tell me about the Followers of the Apocalypse?
translation: 关于天启追随者，你知道些什么？

original: They're based out of the old fort in Freeside. They supposedly helped the NCR out at some point, but they go their own way now.
translation: 他们的基地设在自由城的摩门要塞。据说他们原来曾帮助过NCR，但现在已经分道扬镳了。

original: They know stuff about tech and medicine and usually help out anybody who asks. Can't say I know any more than that.
translation: 他们懂得科学和医疗技术，对需要帮助的人会毫不犹豫地伸出援手。至于其他的，我也知道的不多。

original: There may be a battle in the near future at the Hoover Dam. Can you offer any assistance?
translation: 可能要不了多久胡佛水坝就会打仗了，你能帮忙吗？ ?

original: Of course, my child. After all that you have done for us we would love to help you in the upcoming battle.
translation: 当然，我的孩子。你为我们做了那么多，我们很乐意在接下来的战斗里帮助你。.

original: After all the training in virtual reality, the young ones would relish an opportunity to put their skills to battle. We'll be there when you need us.
translation: 在虚拟环境中训练了那么久，这些年轻人终于有机会在实战中检验训练成果了。只要你需要，我们随叫随到。

original:
set VstoryEventBoomers to 1
if getobjectivedisplayed VMS23 10 
	setObjectiveCompleted VMS23 10 1
	setObjectiveDisplayed VMS23 30 1
endif

if getobjectivedisplayed VMQHouse3 40
	setobjectivecompleted VMQHouse3 40 1
	setobjectivedisplayed VMQHouse3 45 1
endif

if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ02 20
	SetObjectiveCompleted VMQ02 20 1
	SetObjectivedisplayed VMQ02 25 1
endif

if GetQuestRunning VMQYesMan02
	SetObjectiveCompleted VMQYesMan02 20 1
	SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 22 1
endif
We have our ears on the radio waves. When the fighting starts you can count on our air support.
translation: 我们会监听无线电波段。战斗开始后，你可以呼叫我们的空中支援。

original:
set VstoryEventBoomers to 1
if getobjectivedisplayed VMS23 10 
	setObjectiveCompleted VMS23 10 1
	setObjectiveDisplayed VMS23 30 1
endif

if getobjectivedisplayed VMQHouse3 40
	setobjectivecompleted VMQHouse3 40 1
	setobjectivedisplayed VMQHouse3 45 1
endif

if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ02 20
	SetObjectiveCompleted VMQ02 20 1
	SetObjectivedisplayed VMQ02 25 1
endif

if GetQuestRunning VMQYesMan02
	SetObjectiveCompleted VMQYesMan02 20 1
	SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 22 1
endif
Are you and your people still ready to help in the upcoming battle at Hoover Dam?
translation: 你和你的人准备好在胡佛水坝即将到来的战斗里帮忙了吗？

original: What makes the NCR too ambitious?
translation: 是什么让NCR那么野心勃勃？

original: They expand, fast. If you've got land they want, they'll take it, eventually. Did it out West, they'll do it here.
translation: 他们扩张得很快。要是你的地盘被他们看上，他们就一定会把它抢下来。在西部他们就是这么干的，到这儿也一样。

original: {Warning tone to govt}They keep rolling over people, they'll regret it. That's how revolutions start.
translation: {Warning tone to govt}他们不停地压迫人民，他们会后悔的。有压迫就有反抗。

original: What are you working on?
translation: 你在研究什么？

original: The Nightkin have varying degrees of mental instability due to their addiction to Stealth Boy use. I've been trying to come up with a cure.
translation: 由于长期依赖隐身小子，夜行族都患有不同程度的精神失常。我一直在寻找治愈的方法。

original: I'm currently investigating the local Nightstalker population since they seem to have developed a natural stealth field.
translation: 目前我正在调查本地的夜行兽种群，因为它们似乎进化出了一种天然的隐形力场。

original: I've also gotten my hands on a working Stealth Boy Mark II prototype, but that experiment is riskier. I'd rather not pursue that research just yet.
translation: 我手头倒是有一台II型隐身小子的原型机，但实验的风险太大。我暂时还不打算用它来做研究。

original: set vDialogueJacobstown.HenryMentionedExperiment to 1
What's the story with Keene?
translation: 基恩到底是个怎样的人？

original: {Keene alive}Smart, charismatic. One hell of a mean streak. Doesn't care for humans. Prefers fighting them to talking.
translation: 他很聪明，能说会道，心眼却很坏。丝毫不在乎人类。宁可与他们开战也不愿好好商量。

original: He's got a lot of pull with Nightkin, though. He talks, they listen. Was hoping he could draw other Nightkin to Jacobstown.
translation: 但他在夜行族内部很有影响力。凡是他说的话，他们全都听。我本来还希望他能多招徕些夜行族到雅各布斯镇来。

original: Keene is saner than most, but I know he's thinking of going his own way again. He's aggressive, impatient. Can't stand sitting around.
translation: 基恩比多数人都要理智，但我知道他又要开始独断专行了。他太好战，又没耐心。肯定坐不住。

original: What's wrong with the Nightkin?
translation: 夜行族有什么问题？

original: Nightkin suffer schizophrenia from the Stealth Boys they're always using. One of the reasons I settled Jacobstown was so they could be cured.
translation: 夜行族因为长期使用隐身小子而饱受精神分裂之苦。我之所以选择在雅各布斯镇定居，其中一个原因就是为了找到解药。

original: While they're in town, the Nightkin aren't allowed to have Stealth Boys so their craziness doesn't get worse.
translation: 在这里，他们不允许使用隐身小子，所以狂躁症会有所减轻。

original: Trouble is the Nightkin don't like being visible, either. They don't take being exposed too well.
translation: 问题是夜行族也不想被人看见。他们不喜欢太过暴露。

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: Good. Hey, I got another job for you if you're interested.
translation: 很好。嘿，如果你有兴趣的话，我这还有个活儿。

original: SET VMS42.cookeGeckosKilled TO 1\nsetObjectiveDisplayed vms42 20 0\nsetObjectiveDisplayed vms42 40 0
Tell me about the area outside the vault.
translation: 跟我说说避难所之外的区域。

original: It's a fucking deathtrap around here. Fiends swarm all over Vault 3 in the east, and there are fucking Deathclaws south of that, at Quarry Junction.
translation: 这地区真他妈的危险。恶魔帮占据了东边的3号避难所，南边的采石场枢纽全是他妈的死亡爪。

original: If you're looking for humans, the Khans are north of us, and there's an NCR base at McCarran, past Vault 3. Supposedly there are muties to the southeast.
translation: 如果你要找人类的话，我们的北边是大汗帮，过了3号避难所有个NCR基地在麦卡伦机场。我估计东南边还有变种人。

original: What's going on here?
translation: 怎么回事？

original: That coward Lem has been talking about surrendering to the NCR. Now the men are confused, not sure who's leading this gang. Fucking idiots.
translation: 莱姆那个胆小鬼居然鼓动大家向NCR投降。现在帮里人心惶惶，连谁是老大都不知道了。妈的一群草包。

original: How goes your research for the Nightkin cure?
translation: 你对治疗夜行族的研究进行的如何？

original: Promising, but I won't be able to synthesize the drug anytime soon. I really should get back to my work.
translation: 有希望，但是短期内还是做不出对应的解药。我得回去工作了。

original: I met a kid who's unsatisfied with life in the Great Khans. Will you take him on as a Follower?
translation: 我在大汗帮营地遇到一个满腹牢骚的年轻人。你能接纳他加入天启追随者吗？

original: We're always looking for new members. Does he have any particular talent?
translation: 我们一向是来者不拒。他有什么特殊天赋？

original: NewsStory
translation: 新故事

original: NCR Rangers are being pulled off the front lines as part of a campaign to "secure existing NCR territory," according to anonymous sources.
translation: 根据匿名消息，为了"保护现存的NCR领土"，NCR的游骑兵部队撤出了前线。

original: A big congratulations to a young band of soldiers who shattered NCR records on a combat readiness evaluation at Camp Golf. Go get 'em, guys!
translation: 一队年轻的士兵在高尔夫营地举行的训练考核中打破了NCR以往的记录。加油啊，伙计们!

original: Tensions are brewing in Freeside between the ruling gang known as the Kings and the large number of NCR squatters seeking refuge there.
translation: 自由城的紧张局势正在进一步升级。本地帮派猫王帮与大量NCR外来移民之间的关系正在持续恶化。

original: set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 33;
The Kings have been killed in a fight with NCR forces after weeks of mounting hostility. Witnesses report The King's last word was simply "Don't."
translation: 在持续数周的武力挑衅之后，猫王帮成员被NCR军悉数剿灭。有目击者说，猫王临死前只说了两个字"不要。"

original: The Kings gang in Freeside has put an official end to hostilities with the NCR. An RNV reporter was on-hand to speak with The King.
translation: 自由城的猫王帮已正式终止和NCR的敌对状态。一位维加斯广播电台的记者正在和猫王交谈。

original: set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 35;
Sources close to the Omertas tell us a newcomer has been meeting privately with bosses Nero and Big Sal, unusual for a Family outsider.
translation: 据黑手党的内部人士爆料称，有位外来人与老板尼禄和大萨尔举行了一次私人会面。对于家族以外的人来说，这非常少见。

original: set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 39;
Rumors continue to swell that Mr. House, the father of New Vegas, has passed away. Who will fill the power vacuum on the Strip remains uncertain.
translation: 新维加斯之父豪斯先生去世的谣言正在不断传开。至于谁会来填补这一权力真空现在还无从得知。

original: Insiders are saying a key Legion prisoner has escaped Camp McCarran. The prisoner is armed and dangerous, and may be dressed as an NCR trooper.
translation: 内部消息人士声称一名军团的关键囚犯逃出了麦卡伦营地。犯人身上拥有武器且极度危险，另外他可能穿着NCR突击兵的制服。

original: The Bitter Springs refugee camp has been overrun by Legion slavers. Refugees should stay away, and avoid talking to strangers in football pads.
translation: 军团的奴隶贩子侵占了苦泉的难民营地。建议难民最好远离那里，并避免和穿橄榄球服的陌生人交谈。

original: A few Great Khans are on the loose after an aborted standoff left at least two NCR hostages dead. The NCR is offering a reward for their capture.
translation: 两名大汗帮成员在谈判失败后逃之夭夭，事件已造成至少两名NCR人质丧生。目前NCR正在悬赏捉拿这两名逃犯。

original: Eyewitnesses outside Camp McCarran are reporting a large explosion near its monorail station. The NCR is denying the incident.
translation: 据麦卡伦营地外的一位目击者称，营地内的轨道站附近发生了严重爆炸。NCR否认了事故的发生。

original: There's word from Camp McCarran that an attempt to bomb its monorail system was foiled by an alert civilian contractor. Security is being tightened.
translation: 麦卡伦营地传来消息，一位公民阻止了一起针对营地内单轨铁路的爆炸袭击。目前该地区正在提高安全警戒。

original: The NCR flag has been hoisted over former Legion outpost Nelson after heavy fighting. NCR officials are calling this a big win for troop morale.
translation: 经过激烈的交火，NCR终于攻占了军团的岗哨纳尔逊。为振奋士气，NCR官方将其称之为一场大捷。

original: Legion raiders have sacked Camp Forlorn Hope, eliminating all remaining NCR forces there and giving the Legion a strong foothold along the river.
translation: 军团洗劫了飘零希望营地。所有剩余的NCR部队均被剿灭，军团在河岸边拿下了一个坚实的立足点。

original: A source within the Great Khans is saying the gang has reached an accord with the NCR, and will support them in any conflict with Caesar's Legion.
translation: 一名来自大汗帮的消息人士称，部落已和NCR达成协议，他们将会在NCR与凯撒军团的冲突中为其提供协助。

original: set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 22;
Eyewitnesses report seeing roving bands of troops wearing power armor and carrying advanced weapons along the 95.
translation: 有目击者在95号公路发现大批身着动力装甲，携带重型武器的士兵正在行军。

original: set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 23;
NCR has failed to retake the prison it recently lost in a deadly riot. Powder Gang operations against the NCR are expected to continue.
translation: NCR试图重新控制发生暴乱的监狱，但行动以失败告终。炸药帮抵抗NCR的行动仍将继续。

original: Listeners have been unable to pick up radio broadcasts from Black Mountain recently. Most are calling the static, quote, a welcome improvement.
translation: 近期，黑山的广播突然暂停了。多数人认为电台正在进行改版，“将以崭新的面貌示人”。

original: Troubling news from Primm as merchants report a large presence of armed, unsavory figures patrolling the town. Residents are nowhere to be found.
translation: 一则来自普瑞姆的令人担忧的消息，商人们称看见一大批武装分子在镇上巡逻。而该地的居民全都不见了踪影。

original: The Black Mountain radio signal is back after a long absence. Listeners say the new programming is, quote, less for outcasts, more for weirdos.
translation: 长期停播的黑山电台信号现在恢复了。听众们认为，新节目“与其说是给流浪者听，还不如说是给怪人听”。

original: The HELIOS One solar power plant remains dormant despite NCR efforts to reactivate the facility.
translation: 虽然NCR想要重启太阳神一号的太阳能电池板，但该设施仍然一直处于停转状态。

original: set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 70;
Scavengers report hulking individuals moving around Hidden Valley after dusk, but have been unable to identify them due to low visibility.
translation: 有拾荒者爆料，有人在黄昏时分于隐谷附近看见了身着铁皮的行人。但由于能见度太低，无法辨别他们的身份。

original: The influx of displaced residents to the refugee camp at Bitter Springs has caused a strain on rations there. NCR officials are asking for donations.
translation: 居民仍在不断涌入苦泉镇的难民营地。当地粮食储备已经变得愈发紧张。NCR官方正在请求捐助。

original: NCR officials at Camp McCarran were relieved when technical difficulties with its monorail line to the New Vegas Strip proved easy to fix.
translation: 通往新维加斯长街的单轨铁路技术难题目前已经被轻松修复，麦卡伦营地的NCR官员们都舒了一口气。

original: Set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 77
McCarran needs a regular shipment of brahmin meat and spices for the mess hall.
translation: 麦卡伦需要一批双头牛肉和香料来保障餐厅的运作。

original: Won't be a problem. We have plenty of spice traders working with us back home, and we could get meat from the local Brahmin ranchers.
translation: 没问题。老家那边不少香料商人都与我们有合作，而当地的双头牛牧场主则可以向我们提供牛肉。

original: The bigger issue is payment. To supply the camp with meat will cost some serious caps.
translation: 问题是钱。向营地供应肉制品可是个烧钱的事。

original: Contreras sent me for some medical supplies.
translation: 孔特雷拉斯让我来拿药品。

original: Here you go. Let him know he needs to make another payment if he wants more of this stuff.
translation: 给你。告诉他，如果还想要货的话得再付钱了。

original: NVBlakeREF.removeitem NVContrerasMedicalSupplies 1\nRemoveNote VFreeformMcCarranContreras2CrimsonCaravan
set VFreeformMcCarran.iMedicalSupplies to 2\nplayer.additem NVContrerasMedicalSupplies 1
Reports indicate that NCR forces emerged victorious, and the Legion scattered amidst the defeat of its most feared military leader.
translation: 报道称NCR方面取得了胜利，而军团也由于其首领的殒命而迅速溃败。

original: Preliminary word is that Caesar's Legion has taken control of the Dam, and that the NCR presence in Nevada is severely crippled.
translation: 目前的初步消息，凯撒军团已经控制了大坝，而NCR在内华达的势力被严重削弱了。

original: While it initially appeared to be an NCR victory, we're receiving word that our own Mr. House may have been the one to secure the Dam for himself.
translation: 尽管表面上看上去是NCR的胜利，但据我们获悉，豪斯先生或许才是真正保护大坝的那个人。

original: But in a shocking turn of events, the Dam has been rendered useless, and both sides have taken heavy casualties. Neither faction appears to have won.
translation: 情况突发巨变，大坝好像已经彻底损毁，而双方都遭到重创，看来结果是两败俱伤。

original: But in a shocking turn of events, an army of Securitrons has seized control of the Dam, preventing both sides from claiming it.
translation: 但情况突变，一支电子保安军队控制了大坝，使得两边都未能占领这个战略要地。

original: The Rangers' versions of the reports they sent to Camp Golf don't match what you received.
translation: 游骑兵送到高尔夫营地的报告和你收到的报告不一样。

original: {Hanlon alive}I knew it. Every one of the false reports was signed off by Chief Hanlon at Camp Golf, but why would the Chief manipulate the reports?
translation: {Hanlon alive}我知道。高尔夫营地送来的报告都是汉隆军士长签发的，可他为什么要篡改报告？

original: I need you to take everything we've found to Chief Hanlon and confront him with it. I don't want to make this public unless we have to.
translation: 我要你把我们发现的情况记下来，去和汉隆军士长当面对质。不到万不得已，我不想公开此事。

original:
SetStage VMS52 60
Player.AddItem Caps001 300
RewardXP 300
AddReputation RepNVNCR 1 2
What else did you need me to do?
translation: 你还需要我做什么？

original: We've received some disturbing reports from some of the Ranger stations - heavy casualties at Alpha, {disbelief}Super Mutant Legionaries at Delta.
translation: 我们从部分游骑兵驻站那儿收到了一些坏消息——阿尔法驻站遇到了重大伤亡，{disbelief}德尔塔驻站出现了军团的超级变种人士兵。

original: The weirdest one has to be the Great Khans and their trained Deathclaws at Foxtrot. These reports can't be accurate. {less certain}Can they?
translation: 最古怪的是大汗帮，他们居然在狐步舞驻站附近训练死亡爪。这些报告肯定不够准确。{less certain}你说是吧？

original: I know you've already been out there, but could you do me a solid and confirm these reports with the Rangers who sent them in?
translation: 我知道你已经跑了不少地方，但能不能再麻烦你帮我一次，去找那些送报告过来的游骑兵确认一下情况？

original: Does the Legion know you're watching them from here?
translation: 军团知道你在这里监视他们吗？

original: Undoubtedly. Rangers are tough nuts to crack, though, and any force small enough to launch a surprise attack isn't going back in one piece.
translation: 毋庸置疑。但游骑兵可是难啃的骨头，就算有一小撮敌人来偷袭，最后也只能躺着回去。

original: On the other hand, if the Legion goes for a full-scale attack, we'll see 'em coming, fall back, and wait for reinforcements.
translation: 另一方面，即便军团发动全面进攻，我们也看得到，完全可以从容不迫地撤退，等待援军。

original: So, we know what they'll do and they know what we'll do, so we just sit around and keep an eye on each other.
translation: 所以，我们了解他们的企图，他们也知道我们的目的，两边就这样干坐着，大眼瞪小眼。

original: The NCR is letting the Legion get away with slavery?
translation: NCR会放任军团贩卖奴隶？

original: Believe me, I would love orders to take Cottonwood Cove apart and kick the Legion back across the river.
translation: 相信我，我也想下令立刻攻占棉白杨湾，把军团赶回河对岸。

original: But, the brass at McCarran doesn't want us to waste resources on something they consider a minor target. So we just get to watch.
translation: 但是，麦卡伦的官员们认为那无足轻重，不想让我们浪费资源。我们也只好坐着干等了。

original: Has there been much fighting around here?
translation: 这里最近战斗频繁吗？

original: Skirmishes, mostly. The Legion raiding parties usually fall back when they know it's us they're up against.
translation: 大部分是遭遇战。只要发现对手是我们，军团的劫掠队一般都会乖乖撤回去。

original: Why do you need reinforcements?
translation: 为什么你们需要援军？

original: The Legion's been sending raiding parties across the river in larger numbers lately. We don't have the men at this post to intercept them all.
translation: 最近军团不断派出劫掠队过河。我们驻站的人手不够，无法全部拦截他们。

original: What's going on with the Great Khans?
translation: 大汗帮的人怎么了？

original: One of my patrols was on its way back from Novac when it came under fire from the Great Khans.
translation: 我的一支巡逻队刚从诺瓦克回来，就遭遇了大汗帮的袭击。

original: They radioed for reinforcements, but instead of waiting for us, they chased the Khans into the ruins where they were caught in a crossfire.
translation: 他们用无线电请求支援，但没等我们抵达，他们就跟着那伙大汗帮进了废墟，之后就被敌人包了饺子。

original: No deaths, but not all of the squad got out. The Khans have Private Ackerman and Private Gilbert as hostages.
translation: 虽然没有人阵亡，但队伍里有几个人没能突围出来。大汗帮的人抓了列兵阿克曼和吉尔伯特当人质。

original: if VFreeformBoulderCity.MentionedGreatKhans == 0\nset VFreeformBoulderCity.MentionedGreatKhans to 1\nendif
set VMS20.bMonroePermission to 1
Where does the concrete come from?
translation: 这些水泥是哪来的？

original: {Quarry Junction Deathclaws dead}Most of the limestone comes from Quarry Junction out west. The supply had stopped for awhile because of a Deathclaw problem.
translation: {Quarry Junction Deathclaws dead}石灰大多是从西边的采石场里运来的。不过由于死亡爪肆虐，那里的供应一度中断了。

original: I heard some badass wastelander killed the Deathclaws, and deliveries of limestone have been coming in again.
translation: 我听说有个厉害的流浪者干掉了那些死亡爪，现在石灰的运输又恢复了。

original: I don't think they've gotten the trains up and running yet, but most of the concrete plant workers have come back to town now. Good for business.
translation: 虽然铁路应该还没有修好，但大多数水泥厂的工人都已经回到镇上来了。对工厂来说是件好事。

original: {Quarry Junction Deathclaws not dead}Most of the limestone comes from Quarry Junction out west, but I hear some Deathclaws overran the quarry.
translation: {Quarry Junction Deathclaws not dead}石灰大多是从西边的采石场里运来的，但我听说采石场那边的死亡爪已经泛滥成灾了。

original: With no work to be had, all the workers around here have wandered off. I'm the only one left in town.
translation: 没有活可干，附近的工人也就纷纷跑路了。我是唯一留在这镇上的人。

original: ShowMap QuarryJunctionMapMarker
Why are you still here?
translation: 为什么你还留在这儿？

original: I'm not quite sure the kind of greeting NCR troopers will give an escaped con like myself. Figure it's better to stay put for now.
translation: 我不确定NCR部队会以何种方式欢迎像我这样的逃犯。我想现在还是待在这里为妙。

original: What am I looking for in Primm?
translation: 要我去普瑞姆干嘛？

original: I know the NCR has troops near Primm, so talk to the locals and find out if any of those troops are going to be coming our way.
translation: 我知道在普瑞姆附近驻有NCR的军队，和当地人谈谈，调查一下那些军队是不是正准备朝我们这边来。

original: I got rid of him.
translation: 我解决他了。

original: Good. Had him figured for NCR, one of the rangers maybe. Anyway, speaking of the NCR, I need you to take a walk down to Primm.
translation: 很好。他可能是NCR，也可能是游骑兵。说到NCR，我希望你去一趟普瑞姆。

original: The NCR hasn't raised hell over our breakout, and I want to find out why. They're up to something, I can feel it.
translation: 我们越狱后，NCR还没有发起反攻，我想知道为什么。凭我个人的直觉，他们一定在搞什么名堂。

original: SetStage VMS02 30
What exactly is "funny" about that merchant you want me to check out?
translation: 你要我去盘查的那个商人到底哪里"可笑"了？

original: {Non-dummy}Most people already know we run this territory, and are usually in a hurry to get out. Not this guy. It's like he wants us to come get him.
translation: {Non-dummy}多数人都知道这里是我们的地盘，通常会避着走，可这家伙却是个例外，感觉他明摆着就是要我们去抢劫的。

original: {Dummy}{annoyed a player's stupidity}Not "ha ha" funny, you moron. Funny as in suspicious. He's not trying to run away like most people.
translation: {Dummy}{annoyed a player's stupidity}我不是指"哈哈"大笑，你这个白痴。是很可疑的意思。他和其他人不一样，居然没有逃走。

original: Chavez has been dealt with. You won't see him around here anymore.
translation: 查韦兹已经完蛋了，你再也不会看见他了。

original: I'm happy you cleared that up for me, but we've got another situation to worry about. There's a merchant hanging around near the prison.
translation: 很高兴你帮我除掉了那个杂种，但又出了个状况，监狱附近有个商人在晃悠。

original: Something feels funny about him, and I want you to deal with him. Shake him down if he's legit, but if not, take him out.
translation: 感觉这人有点可笑，你去和他打个交道。如果他是干合法生意的，就勒索他一把，如果他另有目的，就做了他。

original:
NCRCFChavezRef.Disable
ChavezPowderGanger01Ref.Disable
ChavezPowderGanger02Ref.Disable
ChavezPowderGanger03Ref.Disable
SetStage VMS02 20
What do you need done?
translation: 你要我去做什么？

original: This is Powder Ganger territory - my territory. Most of the guys around here understand that. One, Chavez, doesn't.
translation: 这是炸药帮的地盘，我的地盘。这周围绝大多数人都明白这点。只有一个人，查韦兹，他不明白。

original: Chavez formed his own crew and have been hitting traders on their own. Everybody I've sent after him either got killed or weren't able to catch him.
translation: 查韦兹自己组织了团伙去袭击商队。而我派去追捕他的人要么被杀了，要么都失败而归。

original: That leaves you. What do you say?
translation: 所以这件差事就托付给你了，你说呢？

original: Nothing's changed. Chavez won't answer to me, but he and his crew operate in {emphasis "my"}my territory. Deal with him.
translation: 没什么改变，查韦兹依然不听我的话，他和他的团伙还在{emphasis "我的"}我的地盘里胡作非为。把他解决掉。

original: Any other problems?
translation: 还有什么问题？

original: Yeah. On top of everything else, I can't send a patrol on a bathroom break without it being ambushed by someone who heard they were coming.
translation: 有的。最首要的问题就是，我现在都不敢让巡逻队休息，因为他们哪怕是上个厕所的功夫，都会遭遇伏击。

original: So somebody's getting the word out.
translation: 肯定是有人走漏了情报。

original: set VFreeformMcCarran2.bGottenHsuRundown to 2
What challenges does the NCR face here?
translation: NCR在这里面临的困难是什么？

original: Everything was going according to President Kimball's plan at first. We met minor resistance from local troublemakers.
translation: 起初一切都按照金博尔总统的战略顺利进行。我们只遭遇到了本地一些顽固分子的零星抵抗。

original: But our two main objectives are still contested. Mr. House controls the Strip and he won't so much as meet with our ambassador.
translation: 可现在我们却面临着两大无从化解的难题。豪斯先生控制着长街，但他却连我们的大使都不愿意见。

original: And we're holding Hoover Dam, but Caesar's Legion is positioning itself to overrun it. If it falls, so will New Vegas. We'd be forced to withdraw.
translation: 同时，虽然胡佛水坝处于我们的掌控之下，但凯撒军团却一直在调集兵力想要冲垮我们。如果那里失守了，新维加斯也一样保不住。到时我们就只能被迫撤离。

original: Are things mostly quiet between here and the Dam?
translation: 营地和水坝那边的情况都还好吧？

original: Unfortunately, no. In fact, the word from the Ranger stations has been especially concerning lately.
translation: 很遗憾，并不好。事实上，最近从各家游骑兵驻站传来的消息很是让人担忧。

original: It sounds like they've run into overwhelming resistance, and supplies just aren't reaching them.
translation: 他们似乎遭遇了非常顽强的抵抗，而且一直都没得到补给。

original: It's been so bad I asked Sergeant Reyes at Camp Forlorn Hope to look into it and see how it is that things could be so fouled up there.
translation: 情况简直糟糕透顶。我已经让飘零希望营地的雷耶斯军士前去调查，看看到底是什么原因让我们落到这步田地。

original: What's Camp McCarran's role in NCR operations?
translation: 麦卡伦营地在NCR的战略里扮演着怎样的角色？

original: It's our main base. We took it because it lets us keep an eye on the Strip. And it had already been fortified before the Great War.
translation: 它是我们的大本营。我们选择麦卡伦是因为从这里可以监视长街的情况。而且机场在伟大战争之前就已经修筑了防御工事。

original: From here we handle most of the logistics for our operations in Nevada. Troop allocation, supply distribution, intel.
translation: 大部分内华达驻军的后勤工作都是由这里进行指挥的。包括兵力调遣，补给分配以及情报交换。

original: Usually General Oliver runs the show here, but he's on his way to the Dam now, so I've taken on a lot of his duties here.
translation: 通常大本营的事务是由奥利弗将军主持，但现在他要去协防水坝，所以大部分工作都交由我暂时代理。

original: {Cook-Cook dead}You might be interested to know that I killed a Fiend named Cook-Cook.
translation: {Cook-Cook dead}我杀掉了恶魔帮一个叫大厨库克的，你应该会感兴趣吧。

original: You did? Well, that's one hell of a service to humanity, then.
translation: 真的吗？那可真是件造福全人类的大好事啊。

original: I guess I always thought maybe I'd be the one to do it, but I just... never got my nerve up.
translation: 我一直也想这么做，但我始终都没办法……鼓起勇气。

original: Maybe I'll sleep good tonight... {deciding not to share details}Here, take this. It's how I say thanks.
translation: 或许我今晚终于能睡个好觉了……{deciding not to share details}给你，拿着吧。权当是表达我的谢意。

original: player.additem Caps001 300\nplayer.AddItem morphine 3
Be careful they don't charge us any tolls.
translation: 小心，他们可能要我们付过路费。

original: Don't tell them where we're from - or headed.
translation: 别告诉他们我们从哪儿来，或者到哪儿去。

original: What's your opinion on the current situation?
translation: 你对当下的局势有什么看法？

original: Independent New Vegas. If that isn't redundant, I don't know what is.
translation: 独立的新维加斯。如果这不算画蛇添足，我不知道什么才算。

original: But I like its chances.
translation: 不过，我喜欢无限可能。

original: Can you tell me about the Outpost?
translation: 能和我谈谈这个哨站吗？

original: NCR border guard duty mostly. It's our job to make sure the caravans can move safely along I-15 and Highway 95.
translation: 这儿的作用基本上就是保卫NCR的边疆。我们的任务是确保商队能够安全地通过15号州际公路和95号高速公路。

original: Not the best posting or assignment, but it beats being sent East, or patrolling the Colorado. Legion's pretty thick there.
translation: 算不上美差，但总比被派到东边或科罗拉多巡逻好。那些地方军团的势力都很猖獗。

original: Tell me about the Legion.
translation: 跟我说说军团的事。

original: They're slavers, led by a guy named {SEE-zer}Caesar. Or {less certainly, KAI-zar}Caesar. Not sure how you're supposed to say it.
translation: 他们是群奴隶贩子，由一个叫{SEE-zer}恺撒，或者“{less certainly, KAI-zar}凯撒”的人领导。看你怎么念了。

original: A couple of years ago they tried to take over Hoover Dam, but the NCR beat them back. The NCR didn't - or couldn't - finish the job, though.
translation: 几年前他们试图控制胡佛大坝，结果被NCR打得屁滚尿流。但NCR没有——或者说没办法，彻底解决他们。

original: The Legion's got its strength back and is getting ready for another round at the Dam. My money's still on the NCR winning, but you never know.
translation: 现在军团卷土重来，准备对大坝发动新一轮的攻势。虽然我依旧看好NCR赢，但结果到底会怎么样谁也说不准。

original: {warning}We've been hearing stories about Legionaries on the Nevada side of the river, so keep a gun handy. You don't want to get caught by them.
translation: {warning}我听说内华达那边的河岸有军团士兵出没，所以备好枪吧。要是被他们逮到可就完了。

original: set VFreeformGoodsprings.bEasyPeteHooverDam to 1
What's wrong with the NCR?
translation: NCR哪儿不好了？

original: Don't get me wrong - the NCR's got a lot of decent folk in it. It's just that they make you part of them whether you like it or not.
translation: 别误会——NCR有不少好人。只不过无论你是否愿意，他们都会想要吞并你。

original: Towns like Goodsprings and Primm don't stay independent for long, not if you've got something the NCR wants. Still, the NCR keeps the Legion away.
translation: 像清泉镇和普瑞姆这样的地方，只要NCR觉得有用，那它们想要保持独立是不可能的。但不管怎么说，是NCR阻挡了军团的入侵。

original: set VFreeformGoodsprings.bEasyPeteLegion to 1
You sound frustrated.
translation: 你这语气听着很沮丧啊。

original: Frustrated? No. I have my orders - signed, and approved all the way up the chain from Kimball. And I understand the reasons.
translation: 沮丧？不。军令如山——毕竟是从金博尔那儿层层传达下来的。我也明白个中道理。

original: The Outpost isn't a Legion target, yet, not like Vegas or the Dam - but if the caravans get choked here, that's going to bite NCR hard.
translation: 哨站不是军团的目标，至少目前还不像维加斯或者水坝那样重要——但如果商队都卡在这里，那肯定会严重损害NCR的利益。

original: Anyway, didn't mean to talk your ear off. Some days... just feel like more requisition forms and daily reports come across my desk than results.
translation: 我不是有意要发牢骚，只是有时候……感觉我的桌子上堆满了各种申请表单和日常报告，却理不出个结果来。

original: Is NCR sending more troops?
translation: NCR派人来了吗？

original: Sending more troops, yes, to reinforce the Outpost, no. Troops head through here on their way to McCarran or to the frontlines at Forlorn Hope.
translation: 派人？派了，不过都不是派给我们哨站的。他们都直接穿过这里前往麦卡伦或者飘零希望营地了。

original: Or they're on leave, on their way to New Vegas to piss away their pay. All of them, passing through.
translation: 又或者他们正着急地赶去新维加斯找乐子呢。他们全部都是路过这里而已，路过。

original: ShowMap VCampForlornHopeMapMarker\nShowMap CampMcCarranMapMarker
Yeah, I got that part, thanks.
translation: 好的，我明白了，谢谢了。

original: So NCR, tries to hold on to everything. They can't, because it's too big for them to get their arms around.
translation: NCR试图面面俱到，但这不可能。因为他们的臂膀不够长，无法容纳一切。

original: They can't guard the roads, they can't put a line of troops around the Mojave... it's just greed that makes the heads back West even try.
translation: 他们无法保护商路，连在莫哈维派驻巡逻队都做不到……他们居然还能在这儿死撑，纯粹就是因为贪婪。

original: Why are the Nightkin here in Jacobstown?
translation: 为什么夜行族会出现在雅各布斯镇？

original: {cure}The Stealth Boys we use have cumulative, adverse effects on our minds. But, thanks to you, it seems a cure is on the way at last.
translation: 长期使用隐身小子会对我们的心智产生有害的副作用。不过多亏了你，解药似乎很快就能面世了。

original: What does the NCR keep you safe from?
translation: NCR主要给你们提供哪种保护？

original: Well, the wildlife for one thing. Rowdy locals for another.
translation: 这个嘛，主要是防范野生动物之类的。还有粗暴的当地人。

original: They're protecting their own. Just happens to help us.
translation: 其实他们是在保护他们自己。只不过碰巧帮助了我们。

original: They've been holding off this other group from the East, too.
translation: 他们同时还在抵御东边的另一伙人。

original: If NCR didn't grate me so, I'd come here for water resupply.
translation: 如果不是NCR老给我添堵，我就到这里补给淡水了。

original: If there's a reason to attack NCR, Camp Golf's a reason.
translation: 要是有人想攻打NCR，那高尔夫营地肯定是块肥肉。

original: Watch out for the Misfits here - 9th Platoon, word of their fuck-ups is legendary.
translation: 当心这里的后进生——九排，他们不着调可是出了名的。

original: {Under her breath}If you're looking for NCR's spine, ain't going to find it here.
translation: {Under her breath}如果你想找NCR的脊梁骨，这里可找不到。

original: Heard there's still mines in the city - and maybe drunk NCR soldiers spoiling for a fight.
translation: 据说城里还埋着地雷，而且喝醉的NCR士兵会寻衅滋事。

original: Shit. Fiends.
translation: 妈的。恶魔帮。

original: Smells like Fiends.
translation: 闻起来像恶魔帮的味道。

original: Can smell the chem labs and Jet from here.
translation: 在这里能闻到毒品和杰特的味道。

original: Make sure you have a backup weapon, Fiends don't go down easy.
translation: 最好留一件备用武器，恶魔帮可不是那么好对付。

original: Watch for dogs.
translation: 小心狗。

original: NCR's friendly, might be able to resupply.
translation: NCR是友善的，可以弄点补给。

original: NCR flag - not safe, close to it, though.
translation: 有NCR的旗帜，虽然并不算安全，不过也差不多了。

original: Another proud NCR camp.
translation: 又一个自大的NCR营地。

original: You've got trouble. The NCR are planning a raid on this place soon.
translation: 你们有麻烦了。NCR已经要对这里发起进攻了。

original: {explosion heard}Sounds like they're already here. There's no way I'm letting them take me alive.
translation: {explosion heard}听这声音，他们应该是已经打过来了，我绝不会让他们活捉我的。

original: There's no reason for you to stick around and help us, but feel free to kill a few of the bastards on your way out.
translation: 你没必要留在这儿帮我们，但你如果能在出去时顺便替我干掉几个杂种，我也不反对。

original: if (GetObjectiveDisplayed VMS02 40 == 1)\n  SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS02 40 0\nendif

if (GetQuestCompleted VMS02 == 0)
  ; Reward
  RewardXP 200
  player.AddItem caps001 100
  player.AddItem buffout 1
  player.AddItem psycho 1
  player.AddItem mentats 1

SetStage VMS02 100
Why do you think the NCR and the Legion both want the Dam?
translation: 为什么你觉得NCR和军团都想要大坝？

original: I'm pretty sure the NCR wants to hold onto the Dam because it's one of the few places around that can make electricity.
translation: 我敢肯定，NCR想守住大坝是因为那是少数几个还能发电的地方之一。

original: The Legion are a bunch of savages, though. No idea why they'd want the Dam. Probably plan on destroying it or something.
translation: 军团那群野蛮人嘛，鬼才知道他们为什么想要大坝。可能他们就是想炸大坝之类的吧。

original: What can you tell me about the Legion?
translation: 跟我说说军团是什么样的。

original: {disgust mixed with fear}Slavers, killers, and all other kinds of trouble. They dress up like Roman soldiers, so there's no mistaking it when you see them.
translation: {disgust mixed with fear}一群奴隶贩子，杀手，以及各种各样的麻烦制造者。他们都打扮得像罗马士兵，所以如果你见到他们，肯定能认得出来。

original: The rumor is, is that the Legion is far larger than the NCR lets on, and that it's been due to luck that the Legion hasn't overrun the territory.
translation: 有谣言说军团的地盘比NCR大得多，只不过NCR运气好，军团的铁蹄还没蹂躏过他们的领土。

original: Tell me about the NCR.
translation: 跟我说说NCR的事。

original: The New California Republic's got the most power in Nevada. Money, troops, you name it.
translation: NCR，也就是新加州共和国，是内华达最大的势力。要钱有钱，要人有人，要什么有什么。

original: They do what they can to keep things safe in the region, but if you ask me, they're trying to do too much. They're spread too thin.
translation: 他们一直都在试图维护本地区的安全。但要我说，他们想做的事太多，力量分散得太厉害了。

original: Why don't you come with me?
translation: 你为什么不和我一起走呢？

original: I can't leave now. Caesar has gained too much ground. I need to be here in case the NCR fails to hold Hoover Dam.
translation: 我现在不能走。凯撒已经占了不少地方了。我得待在这儿，以防胡佛水坝失守。

original: No offense intended, but why should I go anywhere with you?
translation: 恕我冒昧，但为什么我要跟着你？

original: What can you tell me about the Great Khans?
translation: 关于大汗帮你有什么可以告诉我的？

original: We know they supply the Fiends with illegal chems, but they never stick around in NCR territory for long. They know the land, and move quick.
translation: 我们知道他们在向恶魔帮提供非法药物，但他们从不在NCR的领地上久呆。他们熟悉地形，行动迅速。

original: There's talk from time to time about taking out their base at Red Rock Canyon, but nothing ever comes of it. The Great Khans are tough fighters.
translation: 常有人提出要清剿他们位于红岩峡谷的大本营，但就是没见人付诸行动。大汗帮很难对付。

original: If we ever did go up against them on their home turf, we'd win, but casualties would be high.
translation: 要是我们真跑到他们的地盘上跟他们打，即便能赢，伤亡也会很惨重。

original: ShowMap RedRockCanyonMarker
What's your opinion on the current situation?
translation: 你对当下的局势有什么看法？

original: You're helping the Legion, a slaving army that will almost certainly kill and enslave the majority of people in New Vegas.
translation: 你在为军团效力。要是让他们得势，新维加斯的大部分人毫无疑问都会被屠杀或奴役。

original: What? Did you expect me to applaud your efforts to support a deranged warlord?
translation: 怎么？替一个丧尽天良的军阀卖命，你还指望我为你叫好不成？

original: Caesar is bad. You are bad for helping him. Please stop.
translation: 凯撒是坏人。你帮他就是助纣为虐。请你立刻收手吧。

original: I have to say I don't understand where you're going with Mr. House. The man's been manipulating the locals for as long as anyone can remember.
translation: 我必须得说，我不知道你替豪斯先生卖命究竟有什么目的。长久以来，他一直都在压榨本地人。

original: If you help him kick the NCR and Legion out, he's going to keep right on doing it. The people in Freeside will be just as bad off as they ever were.
translation: 如果你帮他将NCR和军团赶出去，那他会继续一手遮天。如此一来自由城的人民就永远别想过上好日子。

original: If you can find a way to push Mr. House out of the picture as well, I think everyone will be better off.
translation: 如果你能想个办法一并除掉豪斯先生，我想大家会好过一些。

original: Helping the NCR is better than helping Mr. House, but I don't think it's the best solution for the people in New Vegas.
translation: 帮助NCR总比帮豪斯先生强，但对新维加斯的人民来讲，我觉得这不是最佳的解决方案。

original: If the NCR can take full control of Freeside and the Strip, it's going to get worse before it gets better.
translation: 一旦让NCR彻底控制了自由城和长街，那我估计等不到情况改善，就会开始走下坡路了。

original: Besides, even if New Vegas eventually gets representation in the NCR senate, it's not like the NCR runs efficiently.
translation: 还有，即便新维加斯最后在NCR参议院里有了一席之地，也难以保证自己的权利。

original: I think you're on the right track.
translation: 我觉得你走的是一条正道。

original: The only way to ensure relative safety and independence for the people of New Vegas is to prevent others from taking control of the region.
translation: 确保新维加斯人民独立自主的唯一手段，就是防止他人染指这块土地。

original: That means no NCR, no Mr. House, and no Legion.
translation: 也就是说，不能有NCR，不能有豪斯，更不能有军团。

original: It could be better. If we can find a way to work toward the independence of New Vegas, that would be ideal.
translation: 并不算乐观。如果我们能找到一个让新维加斯独立的方法，那局势就会变得理想。

original: But really, as long as you don't help out the Legion, anything's better than that.
translation: 但说真的，只要你不站到军团那一边，怎样都行。

original: What are those statues of?
translation: 那些雕像是什么意思？

original: Those two? Represents unification. {Beat, a little defeated}Mostly good for shade. Won't do much else when the Legion reaches us.
translation: 那两个？代表的是团结。{Beat, a little defeated}不过最大的作用是给人遮荫。军团要是杀到这里，它们屁用都顶不上。

original: What do you think the others will do at Hoover Dam?
translation: 你觉得他们会在大坝之战中有什么表现？

original: I don't think you need to worry about the specifics. Basically, expect a lot of firepower and dead bodies.
translation: 我认为你不必在意细节。基本上，你只需要等着听枪声四起，接着就会看到尸横遍野。

original: Enclave technology is even more advanced than Brotherhood equipment, and in the hands of soldiers as experienced as Moreno and the others...
translation: 英克雷的科技甚至比兄弟会的还先进。而在莫雷诺他们这样的老兵手中……

original: Let's just say it's truly a sight to behold.
translation: 我只能说那绝对会叫人叹为观止。

original: I have some questions about ED-E.
translation: 关于ED-E我有几个问题。

original: {New Line}That beat up old pile of bolts? What do you want to know?
translation: {NewLine}那个老破烂？你想知道什么？

original: I have some questions about your robot.
translation: 我对你的机器人有些疑问。

original: {New Line}That beat up old thing? What do you want to know?
translation: {NewLine}那个老破烂？你想知道什么？

original: Deploy the Securitrons around Vegas.
translation: 在维加斯周边部署电子保安。

original: Whatever you say!
translation: 都听你的！

translation: 别管暴动了，让他们自己打去吧。

translation: 好吧！还有别的事吗？

translation: 外面正发生暴动，我要你即刻镇压。

original: Okay! Anything else?
translation: 好吧！还有别的事吗？

That's all I needed.
translation: 就要这些吧。

original: Come back later if you need anything!
translation: 有什么需要的话，就记得来找我啊！

original: Come back later if you need anything!
translation: 有什么需要的话，就记得来找我啊！

original: Yes Man, I need to talk to you about managing Vegas.
translation: 好好先生，我们需要谈谈维加斯的管理。

original: Anything else I can help with?
translation: 还有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: If your business in the Mojave is concluded, you can leave for pastures anew.
translation: 如果你在莫哈维的事务已经了结，你可以离开前往一片新天地。

original: Depart into pastures anew.
translation: 前往新天地。

original: I'm not ready to leave yet.
translation: 我还不打算离开。

original: I'm ready to leave the Mojave.
translation: 我准备好离开莫哈维了。

original: FPGE has detected that you don't have xNVSE 6.3.0 or JIP LN NVSE 57.01 installed, this mod will not work correctly until these requirements are installed.
translation: FPGE检测到你没有安装xNVSE 6.3.0或JIP LN NVSE 57.01，本mod无法正常运行。

original: xNVSE or JIP LN missing/outdated!
translation: xNVSE或JIP LN缺失/版本过时！

original: OK
translation: 好

original: Hoover Dam Power Plant 01
translation: 胡佛大坝1号机房

original: Camp Forlorn Hope Barracks
translation: 飘零希望营地兵营

original: Miguel's Pawn Shop
translation: 米格尔的典当行

original: Hoover Dam Tower
